Title: Científico de datos
Place: Sant Cugat del Vallès, Catalonia, Spain
Description:
¿Quiénes somos?

En ADAPTICAL proveemos al sistema educativo de soluciones innovadores para mejorar la educación.

 

¡Nuestro primer producto está revolucionando la educación! Mathew es una solución transversal que permite a los centros formativos:

1.    La gestión íntegra de materiales a través de contenido propio.

2.    La generación de actividades basándose en el contenido.

3.    El ahorro de tiempo en la preparación de actividades para sus clases.

Además, Mathew permite generar contenido propio de forma automática, ahorrando tiempo y consiguiendo un salto tecnológico digitalizando su contenido.

 

Somos una startup innovadora y donde el buen ambiente de trabajo y la confianza rigen el día a día. Actualmente contamos con un equipo joven, dinámico y en constante crecimiento. Nuestra sede central está ubicada en Sant Cugat (Barcelona).




¡Te buscamos a ti!

Si… Eres una persona:

Proactiva
Perseverante
Eficiente
Decisiva
Creativa
Innovadora
Orientada a resultados
Con vocación por aprender
Con ganas de conocer las últimas novedades de la IA

 

Esperamos de ti que puedas liderar la implantación de la IA en nuestros productos, permitiéndonos continuar a la vanguarda tecnológica.

 

 Es por ello, que debes tener:

Título de doctorado (PhD) en el ámbito de la IA, ingeniería informática, matemáticas, física o similares.
Conocimientos y experiencia en ML, DL, y NLP/NLG.

 

Valoramos positivamente:

Publicaciones científicas
Experiencia laboral
Colaboración en proyectos Open Source o retos de Kaggle o similares
Conocimientos sobre predicción de series temporales
Conocer las bases del graphDB
Conocimientos de explicabilidad de la IA
Experiencia trabajando con metodologías ágiles
Conocer técnicas de RL
Programación en Python




¿Cómo será tu día a día?

Trabajarás dentro del equipo de tecnología
Deberás desarrollar un proyecto de innovación junto a un equipo de otras cinco personas.
Al ser un proyecto innovador, deberás estar al día de las últimas novedades de la IA, para ser capaz de crear tecnología disruptiva.
Junto al equipo, deberás ser creativo para diseñar sistemas de IA que resuelvan retos que todavía no se han abordado.




¿Qué te ofrecemos?

Contrato indefinido
Trabajo híbrido (2 días presencial en la oficina y 3 en remoto)
Posibilidad de crecimiento dentro de la empresa
Buen ambiente
Un entorno y un equipo basado en la confianza en las personas y la comunicación desde la honestidad y el respeto

Title: AI Programmer
Description:
IO Interactive is currently looking for a skilled AI Programmer to join Project 007, a brand-new James Bond video game to be developed and published by IOI. Featuring a wholly original Bond story, players will step into the shoes of the world's favourite Secret Agent to earn their 00 status in the very first James Bond origin story.



You will be part of the team implementing our very own cutting-edge AI tech. Few AAA companies rely on their own AI technology, but at IO Interactive we have created a brand-new AI framework ready to be implemented across multiple projects. We have our own AI team and we want to grow it.



 



What you will do:



You will work closely with game designers, level designers, and animation programmers not just to make the game come alive on the screens, but to make our games become a fun AAA experience.
You will take part in the design and implementation of our new AI system.
You will develop additional features and bug-fixes for AI running in our current AI system.
The AI team is part of the gameplay team, so you will collaborate with core gameplay and animation programmers. Over time, there will be excellent possibilities for taking different roles.

 



Who you are:



Experienced with AI programming from games, preferably AAA. Knowledge of implementing AI behaviour.
Excellent C++ skills.
Excellent written and verbal communications skills in English.
Open-minded and willing to accept and provide feedback to ensure the highest quality for our systems and gameplay features.

 



Who we are:



IO Interactive is an independent videogame development and publishing company with studios in Copenhagen, Malmö and Barcelona. As the creative force behind some of the most talked-about multiplatform video games in the last decade, we are committed to creating unforgettable characters and experiences – all powered by our award-winning, proprietary Glacier technology.



We know that to achieve those goals, we need courage, talented people and a great working environment – and we do our utmost to have all of that. Across our multiple studios, we’re working on several projects. Crucially though, we’re all one team. We value the work and impact that each person brings to the table and we actively encourage new ideas, whilst listening to your insights along the way.



We have a dedicated team of People Managers, who look after you as an individual and as an employee. With more than 40 nationalities, we know that everyone is different and we are proud to have a reputation for being a friendly workplace with highly-talent people.




Show more Show less

What you will do:

  • You will work closely with game designers, level designers, and animation programmers not just to make the game come alive on the screens, but to make our games become a fun AAA experience.
  • You will take part in the design and implementation of our new AI system.
  • You will develop additional features and bug-fixes for AI running in our current AI system.
  • The AI team is part of the gameplay team, so you will collaborate with core gameplay and animation programmers. Over time, there will be excellent possibilities for taking different roles.

 

Who you are:

  • Experienced with AI programming from games, preferably AAA. Knowledge of implementing AI behaviour.
  • Excellent C++ skills.
  • Excellent written and verbal communications skills in English.
  • Open-minded and willing to accept and provide feedback to ensure the highest quality for our systems and gameplay features.

 

Who we are:

IO Interactive is an independent videogame development and publishing company with studios in Copenhagen, Malmö and Barcelona. As the creative force behind some of the most talked-about multiplatform video games in the last decade, we are committed to creating unforgettable characters and experiences – all powered by our award-winning, proprietary Glacier technology.

We know that to achieve those goals, we need courage, talented people and a great working environment – and we do our utmost to have all of that. Across our multiple studios, we’re working on several projects. Crucially though, we’re all one team. We value the work and impact that each person brings to the table and we actively encourage new ideas, whilst listening to your insights along the way.

We have a dedicated team of People Managers, who look after you as an individual and as an employee. With more than 40 nationalities, we know that everyone is different and we are proud to have a reputation for being a friendly workplace with highly-talent people.

Title: Data Scientist (ASL)
Description:
About ASL In Nestlé

We are a team of Analytical professionals from many countries and diverse backgrounds, each with unique missions and challenges in the biggest health, nutrition and wellness company of the world. We innovate every day through forward-looking projects to create opportunities for Nestlé’s digital challenges with our consumers, customers and at the workplace. We collaborate with our business partners around the world to deliver standardized, integrated technology products and services to create tangible business value.

In order to complete our Analytics Service Line department, we are currently looking for a

Data Scientist.

Position Snapshot

Location: Nestlé Global Hub in Barcelona, Spain
Permanent Contract
Bachelor’s degree
Fluent English


Position Summary

As a Data Scientist, you will have to solve these business questions across various Nestle Business Entities. You will collaborate with different business users across the enterprise to drive the creation and development of business cases to achieve new insights. Your subject matter expertise with predictive modeling will help you advise stakeholders, users, and super-users alike.

Travel activity is low, depending on the project assigned, averaging at below 10%.

A day in the life of...

Partner with Market functions, Globally and Regionally Managed Businesses, and Above Market entities to build and deliver a portfolio of advanced analytics initiatives
Work closely with Market and Centre Functions, Globally and Regionally Managed Businesses, and Above Market entities to identify and answer business problems/questions using appropriate modeling techniques on available data
Monitor data science trends, identify implications, and proactively build Nestlé capabilities.
Collaborate with other Business Analytics teams and networks to utilize new sources of data, for the purpose of developing insights and applicability across markets
Provide enablement services around predictive, diagnostic, and optimization analytics.
Work with large, complex data sets
Work on difficult, non-routine analysis problems, applying advanced analytical methods as needed


What Will Make You Successful?

Bachelor’s degree or higher (Engineering/ Computer Science /Mathematics/Statistics/ Social Science)
Masters would be good to have (in disciplines like Data Science, Business Administrations, Social Science and Economics)
1-2 years of experience in Analytics embedded in Business organizations
would be good to have excellent hands on experience developing advance predictive models to solve business problems
Experience working in a coding language such as R, SQL, Python or similar language
Ability in Univariate/Multivariate Statistics, Bayesian Statistics, or Simulation Modeling is preferred
Ability on data visualization techniques and experience with software is preferred
You are eager to learn new things and are open to the ever changing needs of the new digital world whatever that may mean over the years to come.
Demonstrates personal commitment to change through actions and words
You communicate effectively with all levels of business and technical professionals in English
Willing to work on a multicultural company with professionals across the world

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Overview




Data Science




Join our Data Science team where you will be part of a collaborative interdisciplinary team around data, where you will be responsible of building deployable statistical/machine learning models, starting from the discovery phase. You will work closely with process owners, product owners and final business users. This will provide you the correct visibility and understanding of criticality of your developments.




Your mission




Your role will be to be part of growing team based in Barcelona, to create and support global digital developments for PepsiCo. These developments will be focus on Consumer Analytics and Innovation but with the option in the future to collaborate into other fields such as revenue management, supply chain, manufacturing, logistics.




You will be part of a collaborative interdisciplinary team around data, where you will be responsible of building deployable statistical/machine learning models, starting from the discovery phase. You will work closely with process owners, product owners and final business users. This will provide you the correct visibility and understanding of criticality of your developments.




You will be an internal ambassador of the team’s culture around data and analytics. You will provide stewardship to colleagues in the areas that you are an specialist or you are specializing.




Responsibilities




Your day to day with us:




Active contributor to code development in projects and services
Act as contributor in innovation activities
Partner with data engineers to ensure data access for discovery and proper data is prepared for model consumption.
Partner with ML engineers working on industrialization.
Occasionally, coordinate work activities with Business teams, other IT services and as required.
Communicate with business stakeholders in the process of service design, training and knowledge transfer.
Support large-scale experimentation and build data-driven models.
Set KPIs and metrics to evaluate analytics solution given a particular use case.
Refine requirements into modelling problems.
Influence product teams through data-based recommendations.
Research in state-of-the-art methodologies.
Create documentation for learnings and knowledge transfer.
Create reusable packages or libraries.




Qualifications




What will you need to succeed?




6+ years’ experience building solutions in the commercial or in the supply chain space.
6+ years working in a team to deliver production level analytic solutions. Fluent in git (version control). Understanding of Jenkins, Docker are a plus.
6+ years’ experience in ETL and/or data wrangling Fluent in SQL syntaxis.
6+ years’ experience in Statistical/ML techniques to solve supervised (regression, classification) and unsupervised problems. Experiences with Deep Learning are a plus.
6+ years’ experience in developing business problem related statistical/ML modeling with industry tools with primary focus on Python or Scala development.
Business storytelling and communicating data insights in business consumable format. Fluent in one Visualization tool.
Strong communications and organizational skills with the ability to deal with ambiguity while juggling multiple priorities
Experience with Agile methodology for team work and analytics ‘product’ creation. Fluent in Jira, Confluence.
Experience with Azure cloud services is a must.
Experience in Reinforcement Learning is a plus.
Experience in Simulation and Optimization problems in any space is a plus.
Experience with Bayesian methods is a plus.
Experience with Causal inference is a plus.
Experience with NLP is a plus.
Experience with working with FAIR data is a plus.
Experience with Responsible AI is a plus.
Experience with distributed machine learning is a plus




What makes us different?




Hybrid working model: combination of remote and collaborative office experience to enable innovation
Flexible work schedule
Variety of benefits to support your physical, emotional and financial wellbeing
Professional growth possibilities & learning opportunities
Volunteering opportunities to help external communities
Space to be you to promote our Diversity & Inclusion strategy




About PepsiCo




We believe that culture should be at the cornerstone of everything we do at PepsiCo. We operate with start-up mindset – agile, innovative and not afraid of failure. We want our team to come to work every day excited to explore new ways bring enjoyment, refreshment and fun to the world.




PepsiCo Positive (pep+) is the future of our organization – a strategic end-to-end transformation, with sustainability at the center of how we will create growth and value by operating within planetary boundaries and inspiring positive change for the planet and people. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PO5CdBmWjUY




So, if you’re ready to be a part of a playground for those who think big, we’d love to chat.




 We encourage the diversity of applicants across gender, age, ethnicity, nationality, sexual orientation, social background, religion or belief and disability

About PepsiCo

PepsiCo Positive (pep+) is the future of our organization – a strategic end-to-end transformation, with sustainability at the center of how we will create growth and value by operating within planetary boundaries and inspiring positive change for the planet and people. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PO5CdBmWjUY


So, if you’re ready to be a part of a playground for those who think big, we’d love to chat.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
We’ve been pioneering a world of possibilities to bring surfaces to life for well over 200 years. As experts in making coatings, there’s a good chance you’re only ever a few meters away from one of our products. Our world class portfolio of brands – including Dulux, International, Sikkens and Interpon – is trusted by customers around the globe. We’re active in more than 150 countries and have set our sights on becoming the global industry leader. It’s what you’d expect from the most sustainable paints company, which has been inventing the future for more than two centuries.




Job Purpose




The Data Science team is positioned within the CoE IBP (Center of Excellence for Integrated Business Planning). I




BP is the management process through which we run the company. It is a process of structured collaboration which aligns all layers and functions around one set of data, one plan, and joint decisions. In the CoE IBP, we standardize and optimize the planning cycle and E2E supply chain, as an end goal to optimize service level, cost, and inventory. This enables the company to achieve the best possible performance for our customers, employees, and shareholders.




We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist to join our high performing team




The Role And Its Responsibilities




Identify business needs and translate them into technical requirements
Closely work with Data Engineers to build robust data infrastructure
Data cleansing, standardization, exploration at selection
Implement statistical models, machine learning, predictive models, optimization, simulation models and ad hoc analysis in a big data environment
A/B Testing
DevOps/ Agile WoW




About You




MSc in Operations Research, Statistics, Mathematics, Physics or any quantitative field
Implementation of statistical models, machine learning, predictive models, and analysis in a big data environment
Programming languages: Scala, Python, PySpark, SQL
Sound communication skills
Team player
Platform: Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Alteryx , E xperience with A/B testing and in Supply Chain is a plus.




All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age or disability.




Requisition ID: 29079

Title: Python Developer (FW)
Place: Sant Cugat del Vallès, Catalonia, Spain
Description:
¿Te interesa trabajar como Python Developer dentro de un entorno internacional?

En BETWEEN apostamos por ofrecerte las mejores oportunidades dentro del área tecnológica. Contamos con un equipo de más de 800 profesionales. Ser parte de nuestro equipo significa formar parte de una comunidad multicultural, con acceso a oportunidades de crecimiento y desarrollo profesional, generando impacto.

Si quieres desarrollar tus capacidades en un entorno internacional, apostando por trabajar en soluciones de I+D tanto en Ingeniería como en IT, ¡este es tu próximo destino!

Damos soporte en una gran variedad de áreas como Operaciones, Desarrollo de producto, Compras, Firmware, Software, Business Intelligence, Gestión, Transformación digital, ¡y muchas más! Además, desarrollamos soluciones tecnológicas a medida desde nuestros Hubs Tecnológicos.

La persona seleccionada trabajará con los datos de campo y posteriormente implementará correcciones en el FW de la maquina con Python, según el análisis previo de los datos.

¿Qué haré? Estas serán tus funciones principales:

Extracción y análisis los datos de campo proporcionados por las maquinas industriales con las cuales se trabaja.
Implementación de correcciones en el FW de la maquina teniendo en cuenta el análisis de datos mediante Python.


¿Cómo lo haré?

Tendrás horario flexible
Te integrarás en un equipo de alto rendimiento y con un alto grado de especialización.
Podrás trabajar en remoto o en modelo híbrido.
Tendrás un PC y los periféricos necesarios para el desarrollo de tu trabajo.
Podrás trabajar desde casa de cliente, nuestras oficinas de Barcelona en el 22@, los Hubs Tecnológicos o en el resto de las oficinas.
Trabajarás en un entorno internacional.


Si eres BETWEENER obtendrás estos beneficios:

Seguro médico con Sanitas.
Dispondrás de oportunidades de formación y desarrollo profesional: Idiomas, cursos en Udemy, Certificaciones, Programa The Power Business School y Bootcamps especializados (Agile, DevOps, IA & Big Data, Ciberseguridad, etc.).
Contarás con un equipo de Talento que te acompañará durante toda tu experiencia con nosotros. ¡Haremos un café una vez al mes! Así, mantendremos el contacto.
Pondremos a tu disposición un amplio abanico de retos y proyectos acordes con tus objetivos personales y profesionales.
Posibilidad de elegir cómo obtener parte de tu salario gracias a las ventajas fiscales de nuestra Retribución Flexible (Ticket restaurant, Ticket transporte, Ticket guardería).
Descuentos para acceder a centros de Fitness con Gympass.
Acceso a nuestro Club de Descuentos: Inspiring Benefits.
En BETWEEN nos gusta mucho hacer networking, por lo que te invitaremos a participar en todos estos eventos ¡y más!: las BETWEEN Nights, torneos deportivos, Black Mamba Race, viernes de vermut, juegos de mesa, etc.
Podrás disfrutar de nuestras fantásticas oficinas del 22@ las cuales disponen de Rooftop, tirador de cerveza, mesa de ping-pong y futbolín.
Programa de recomendación remunerado de Talento.
En BETWEEN, la igualdad de oportunidades es uno de nuestros valores. Nuestro compromiso es contratar al mejor talento independientemente de su raza, religión, sexo, edad y personas con otras capacidades y promover su desarrollo profesional y personal.


Requisitos:

Ingeniería informática, industrial o similares.
Experiencia de mínimo 2 años en programación.
Experiencia amplia con Python.
Inglés avanzado.
Muy valorable conocimientos de C++.
Show more Show less
HTML:
¿Te interesa trabajar como Python Developer dentro de un entorno internacional?

En BETWEEN apostamos por ofrecerte las mejores oportunidades dentro del área tecnológica. Contamos con un equipo de más de 800 profesionales. Ser parte de nuestro equipo significa formar parte de una comunidad multicultural, con acceso a oportunidades de crecimiento y desarrollo profesional, generando impacto.

Si quieres desarrollar tus capacidades en un entorno internacional, apostando por trabajar en soluciones de I+D tanto en Ingeniería como en IT, ¡este es tu próximo destino!

Damos soporte en una gran variedad de áreas como Operaciones, Desarrollo de producto, Compras, Firmware, Software, Business Intelligence, Gestión, Transformación digital, ¡y muchas más! Además, desarrollamos soluciones tecnológicas a medida desde nuestros Hubs Tecnológicos.

La persona seleccionada trabajará con los datos de campo y posteriormente implementará correcciones en el FW de la maquina con Python, según el análisis previo de los datos.

¿Qué haré? Estas serán tus funciones principales:
  • Extracción y análisis los datos de campo proporcionados por las maquinas industriales con las cuales se trabaja.
  • Implementación de correcciones en el FW de la maquina teniendo en cuenta el análisis de datos mediante Python.

¿Cómo lo haré?
  • Tendrás horario flexible
  • Te integrarás en un equipo de alto rendimiento y con un alto grado de especialización.
  • Podrás trabajar en remoto o en modelo híbrido.
  • Tendrás un PC y los periféricos necesarios para el desarrollo de tu trabajo.
  • Podrás trabajar desde casa de cliente, nuestras oficinas de Barcelona en el 22@, los Hubs Tecnológicos o en el resto de las oficinas.
  • Trabajarás en un entorno internacional.

Si eres BETWEENER obtendrás estos beneficios:
  • Seguro médico con Sanitas.
  • Dispondrás de oportunidades de formación y desarrollo profesional: Idiomas, cursos en Udemy, Certificaciones, Programa The Power Business School y Bootcamps especializados (Agile, DevOps, IA & Big Data, Ciberseguridad, etc.).
  • Contarás con un equipo de Talento que te acompañará durante toda tu experiencia con nosotros. ¡Haremos un café una vez al mes! Así, mantendremos el contacto.
  • Pondremos a tu disposición un amplio abanico de retos y proyectos acordes con tus objetivos personales y profesionales.
  • Posibilidad de elegir cómo obtener parte de tu salario gracias a las ventajas fiscales de nuestra Retribución Flexible (Ticket restaurant, Ticket transporte, Ticket guardería).
  • Descuentos para acceder a centros de Fitness con Gympass.
  • Acceso a nuestro Club de Descuentos: Inspiring Benefits.
  • En BETWEEN nos gusta mucho hacer networking, por lo que te invitaremos a participar en todos estos eventos ¡y más!: las BETWEEN Nights, torneos deportivos, Black Mamba Race, viernes de vermut, juegos de mesa, etc.
  • Podrás disfrutar de nuestras fantásticas oficinas del 22@ las cuales disponen de Rooftop, tirador de cerveza, mesa de ping-pong y futbolín.
  • Programa de recomendación remunerado de Talento.
  • En BETWEEN, la igualdad de oportunidades es uno de nuestros valores. Nuestro compromiso es contratar al mejor talento independientemente de su raza, religión, sexo, edad y personas con otras capacidades y promover su desarrollo profesional y personal.

Requisitos:
  • Ingeniería informática, industrial o similares.
  • Experiencia de mínimo 2 años en programación.
  • Experiencia amplia con Python.
  • Inglés avanzado.
  • Muy valorable conocimientos de C++.

Title: Modeller Data Scientist
Description:
kjgkjg

About ASL In Nestlé

We are a diverse, international team of Analytical professionals applying advanced analytics solutions in the world’s biggest health, nutrition and wellness company.

As an internal consultancy, we collaborate with our colleagues in sales & marketing around the world to deliver value in the areas of marketing effectiveness, and price & promo effectiveness.

In order to complete our Analytics Service Line department, we are currently looking for a Data Scientist / Modeller with FMCG experience in Marketing Mix Modelling and Price & Promo Analytics.

Position Snapshot

Location: Nestlé Global Hub in Barcelona, Spain

Permanent Contract

Bachelor’s degree

Fluent English

About You

You are an expert in applying advanced analytics to solve marketing and sales business problems. You are equally comfortable applying your knowledge to optimize marketing spend or working with sales to optimize trade spend.

You are hands on in your ability to build models, but you are also comfortable coaching less experienced team members in how to solve problems, or managing agencies to deliver where needed.

You know that having a great model isn’t enough, you love to derive the “so what” from you models and tell compelling stories which inspire action and drive growth.

A day in the life of...

You’ll be responsible for using advanced analytics to provide robust measurements of marketing & trade investment across different business models, product categories and varied geographies.

You will work closely with your stakeholders to provide guidance on how best to optimize and allocate marketing & trade investments in order to support the delivery of our commercial strategy.

As part of this role you will need to:

Share your experience & knowledge and build Nestlé’s internal modelling capability
Partner with stakeholders to build and deliver a portfolio of advanced analytics initiatives
Work closely with to identify and answer business problems/questions using appropriate modeling techniques on available data
Evangelize and provide advisory services around data science capabilities and knowledge within Nestlé
Work with large, complex data sets and solve non-standard problems


What Will Make You Successful

Be educated to MSc level (or equivalent) in Math, Statistics, Physics, Operations Research, Econometrics or Data Science.
Have proven experience of handling large datasets and reporting automation.
Be able to demonstrate an excellent understanding of marketing mix modelling and price & promotion analytics.
Experience with dynamic linear models/state space models is of particular interest.
Have the ability to network and influence at senior levels both internally and externally.
Be able to interpret data and explain business performance in an easy to understand way that tells a story to key stakeholders.
Have proven experience of working in a matrix environment; achieving results through effective influencing and collaboration.
Have advanced MS Excel, SQL, R, Python (or similar) experience.

kjhgkjjg

Title: Associate Director Data Scientist - Digital Health R&D
Description:
At AstraZeneca, we work together to deliver innovative medicines to patients across global boundaries. We make an impact and find solutions to challenges. We do this with integrity, even in the most difficult situations, because we are committed to doing the right thing.

The Digital Health Oncology R&D Human-centered AI and Machine Learning Team strives to transform the patient experience and clinical trial process. We will do so by deploying digital solutions to clinical trials and in the real world to decrease patient burden. The approach the team takes will incorporate clinical trial data, Real World Evidence (RWE) data, clinical free text, medical imaging, Patient Reported Outcomes (PROs), and device data to define new digital approaches to addressing the pressing problems across the AZ R&D portfolio.

The team is looking for an Associate Director of Data Science to specialize in development of innovative machine learning methods focused on multi-modal datasets including clinical trial data, RWE, imaging data, and other biomedical data sources to address patient burden.

This role will sit within the Digital Therapeutics, Diagnostics and Endpoints team with a heavy emphasis on interacting with the Therapeutic Areas, clinical trial teams and other collaborators in the product development cycle. This Data Scientist will also work closely with the Digital Health R&D subject matter experts and partners to develop novel approaches that support the development of patient and HCP-facing digital products. Applicants should have a strong foundation in statistics, experience with machine learning in a production environment, detailed knowledge of the clinical trials space in the pharmaceutical industry and experience maintaining a portfolio of machine-learning enabled products.

Examples of projects the team works on include machine learning models for developing digital biomarkers, digital therapeutics, computer vision diagnostics and clinical decision support tools, approaches to quantitatively analyze wearable data, linking of medical imaging data with ‘omics and longitudinal outcomes to identify and/or validate new drug targets, and much more!


Drives projects with hands-on data science, analysis, or mathematical modeling.
Delivers sophisticated data science solutions to AstraZeneca projects, selecting analytical methods with appropriate complexity given a clinical or business challenge.
Engages technical and non-technical collaborators within the wider organization to frame complex challenges, structure analytical solutions, and communicate results.
Independently keeps own knowledge up to date and learns from senior team members, proposing appropriate training courses for personal development.
Reviews working practices and ensures non-compliant processes are raised
Collaborates in a multidisciplinary environment with world leading clinicians, data scientists, biological experts, statisticians and IT professionals.


Essential


B.Sc. in a relevant field (such as mathematics, computer science, engineering).
Demonstrated an outstanding track-record of industry experience with the desired data science methodologies
Practical software development skills in standard data science tools: Python, Agile, Code code versioning (bitbucket/git), UNIX skills, familiarity working in cloud environment (AWS preferred)
End-to-end experience leading collaborative data science projects in an industry setting
ML Ops experience: model tracking, model governance, multiple models in different production contexts
Experience developing machine learning first products including time-series analysis, forecasting, behavioral analysis
Knowledge of range of mathematical and statistical modelling techniques and drive to continue to learn and develop these skills.
Communication, business analysis, and consultancy; ability to present compelling cases to stakeholders and operate dynamically to identify solutions.
Residence: Barcelona


Desirable


Advance degree in rigorous quantitative science (such as mathematics, computer science, engineering) or M.B.A. with analytics experience in industry.
Experience within the pharmaceutical industry
Advanced statistical and machine learning models such as hierarchical mixed bayesian models, transformer-based NLP models, reinforcement learning, deep learning models that span CNN/RNN/LSTM, GNNs, constrained optimization, state-of-the-art timeseries & forecasting models


Why AstraZeneca?

At AstraZeneca when we see an opportunity for change, we seize it and make it happen, because any opportunity no matter how small, can be the start of something big. Delivering life-changing medicines is about being entrepreneurial - finding those moments and recognising their potential. Join us on our journey of building a new kind of organisation to reset expectations of what a bio-pharmaceutical company can be. This means we’re opening new ways to work, pioneering cutting edge methods and bringing unexpected teams together. Interested? Come and join our journey.

So, what’s next!

If you are ready to make a difference - apply today, and we'll make it happen together!

Where can I find out more?


Follow AstraZeneca on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/1603/
Follow AstraZeneca on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/astrazenecacareers/
Follow AstraZeneca on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/astrazeneca/
Show more Show less

Title: Research Assistant in Data Science/Management/Economics
Description:
Assisting in applied economics/management research on innovation and social capital. Construction & analysis of datasets. Network analysis.

Applied machine learning. Text mining. Simulations.

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in economics, data science, computer science, mathematics, statistics, or related field.
Knowledge of Stata or R or willingness to learn required.
Knowledge of Python required and knowledge of one deep learning package (e.g., PyTorch) helpful. Knowledge of C / C++ helpful.
Knowledge of Ubuntu, Debian, or Pop_OS! very helpful.
Work-permit in Spain
High level of spoken and written English.


Requisitos:

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in economics, data science, computer science, mathematics, statistics, or related field.
Knowledge of Stata or R or willingness to learn required.
Knowledge of Python required and knowledge of one deep learning package (e.g.PyTorch) helpful. Knowledge of C/C++ helpful.
Work-permit in Spain
High level of spoken and written English.


Conditions:

Full time position: 1.650 euros / months before tax

Start date: As soon as possible

End date: 1 year with the possibility of extension

Interested parties please send CV, academic transcript and a cover letter in English to:

Sampsa Samila

IESE Business School

Email: ssamila@iese.edu

Title: Senior Data Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
We’re a diverse group of committed individuals empowered to thrive on challenge, share ideas, and pursue our ambition to transform the way commerce works.

So what about you? Do you want to help shape the future? Join us and you’ll open the gateway to a world of endless possibilities.

At Productsup you’ll be an intrinsic player in a vibrant culture that brings together people with opportunities, ideas with implementation, and ambition with achievement.

You can make great things happen in your career by making great things happen in commerce.

Productsup - the place where people are empowered to shape the future of commerce.

Your role and goals

We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist (m/f/d) to join our highly skilled and motivated Data Science team at Productsup.

Our team is currently working on state-of-the-art NLP and Machine Learning pipelines that differentiate Productsup from our competitors. You will have millions of product data specifications at your disposal, access to a strongly scalable inference and training infrastructure, and a team of highly talented data scientists and engineers.

In this role, you will help us in building multiple NLP and Machine Learning pipelines. You will become the sparring partner of our Lead Data Scientist and support the team in increasing the performance of our ML products.

In your first 3 months, you will:

Build a deep understanding of our product, market, and the data infrastructure
Partner closely with product, engineering, and other business leaders to influence decisions with data
Strategically work on how data can be turned into products
Propose improvements to our already existing NLP pipelines and integrate them into production


In your first 6 months and beyond you are:

Helping us increase the global performance of our product, and models and starting to work on newer ones
Proposing, building, and leading initiatives - feature ownership from development to deployment
Laying down the foundations to release our services to other markets
Working with Computer vision to read trademarks and logos on product packaging
Participating in client meetings to provide better solutions
Constantly exploring new technologies and techniques to take our product to the next level
Initiating new projects involving text and image generation


What you bring to the team:

An educational background in Data Science, AI, and/or Machine Learning
4+ years of experience working with Machine Learning / Data Science / Deep Learning
Solid understanding of best practices in NLP
High proficiency in Python and Data Science frameworks (Spacy, PyTorch, Pandas, Kedro, DVC, and Transformers)
Business-oriented mindset with experience in Project Management and Agile Methodologies
Experience working with Machine learning Ops
Experience supporting and mentoring juniors on the team
Strong communication skills, and the ability to communicate complex data problems and solutions with internal as well as external stakeholders
Knowledge of Computer vision is a plus


What we offer you:

A key position at our growing company!
The option to work remotely and flexibly, because we know outstanding talent knows best how and where to work
A unique and thorough onboarding program (Either remotely, or at company headquarters in Berlin) where you’ll learn the ins and outs of our company and product
Ongoing internal and external training, personal learning & development budget, and professional growth opportunities as we scale our thriving business!
Employee referral bonuses: we know that talent attracts talent, and we encourage you to refer people you know to join our team of Feedfighters
The opportunity to take ownership and responsibility, impacting the company’s growth in an international environment with 42+ nationalities


Productsup values diversity. We celebrate our differences and strive to learn from each other with the firm conviction that diversity drives innovation. Our commitment to equal opportunities begins at the hiring process and extends to our whole working culture. We pledge to social and environmental initiatives that support a sustainable environment. Everyone has a unique contribution to make and all are welcome.

  • High proficiency in Python and Data Science frameworks (Spacy, PyTorch, Pandas, Kedro, DVC, and Transformers)
  • Business-oriented mindset with experience in Project Management and Agile Methodologies
  • Experience working with Machine learning Ops
  • Experience supporting and mentoring juniors on the team
  • Strong communication skills, and the ability to communicate complex data problems and solutions with internal as well as external stakeholders
  • Knowledge of Computer vision is a plus

What we offer you:
  • A key position at our growing company!
  • The option to work remotely and flexibly, because we know outstanding talent knows best how and where to work
  • A unique and thorough onboarding program (Either remotely, or at company headquarters in Berlin) where you’ll learn the ins and outs of our company and product
  • Ongoing internal and external training, personal learning & development budget, and professional growth opportunities as we scale our thriving business!
  • Employee referral bonuses: we know that talent attracts talent, and we encourage you to refer people you know to join our team of Feedfighters
  • The opportunity to take ownership and responsibility, impacting the company’s growth in an international environment with 42+ nationalities

Productsup values diversity. We celebrate our differences and strive to learn from each other with the firm conviction that diversity drives innovation. Our commitment to equal opportunities begins at the hiring process and extends to our whole working culture. We pledge to social and environmental initiatives that support a sustainable environment. Everyone has a unique contribution to make and all are welcome.

Title: Python Developer
Company: Prometeo Talent | High-quality HR & recruitment services
Description:
Sobre la compañía 




StockAgile es un software de gestión para las marcas, fabricantes y tiendas, que tiene como objetivo simplificar y resolver todos las operaciones en una misma plataforma. Es una start-up tecnológica en pleno crecimiento con un equipo joven y con mucha ambición. Estamos ubicados en el distrito tecnológico del 22@ en Barcelona.

Nuestra misión es simplificar y automatizar la gestión de las pequeñas y medianas empresas de comercio para que puedan vender a múltiples canales y así crecer sin límites!Queremos ser la empresa líder gestionando, automatizando y optimizando las empresas de comercio. ¿Nos ayudas?




Nuestra propuesta

Buscamos un Python Developer que se sume al equipo para tomar decisiones sobre nuesro producto, actualmente somos 8 personas en el equipo. Queremos alguien que quiera aprender al lado de un equipo joven, agil y con muchas ganas de trabajar y que quiera dejar huella en el mundo del Retail y el sector SaaS.

 

Responsabilidades: 

Diseñar e implementar nuevos casos de uso de la herramienta
Diseñar y desarrollar mejoras en la aplicación web.
Hacer code review y validación de desarrollos del equipo técnico.
Resolver dudas de los desarrollos al equipo de QA 

Lo que buscamos:

Más de 2 años de experiencia desarrollando backend
Experiencia con Python
Experiencia con metodologías ágiles
Se valorará experiencia con Django, Django Rest Framework, Angular/AngularJS y con TDD
Ingles nivel intermedio

Qué ofrecemos?

La oportunidad de crecer personal y profesionalmente junto a una start-up de éxito en el sector Retail Tech y de aprender de todo este proceso con un equipo joven y TOP.
Posibilidad de crecer dentro de la empresa a corto-medio plazo
Flexibilidad horaria
Esquema híbrido - dias de WFH semanal.
Ambiente joven y dinámico
Snacks & Food: fruta fresca, bebidas, snacks, café
Open library, Workshops, Katas Dojos
Cursos de formación
Actividades de teambuilding




Proceso de Seleccion:




Se trata de un screening inicial + 1 entrevista con CTO + Prueba tecnica + Entrevista con CEO

Title: SENIOR DATA SCIENTIST - Dubai, UAE
Description:
Employment type: Full-time & Permanent

Reports to: CEO

Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance)

Annual Base Salary range of  80,000 USD – 150,000 USD + performance-based bonus - 0% tax environment + an opportunity to join our employee share scheme.

About Cobblestone Energy

Cobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading.

We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.

At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. We believe in providing unlimited growth opportunities to our people alongside constant feedback and support, which allows us to cover our vulnerabilities and grow as a team in new and interesting ways. With the right performance and potential, you could be managing the power desk for an entire country within eighteen months in your role. Come join our dream team!

Cobblestone Values

Lifelong learning with continuous reflection
Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas
The team is more important than the individual.
Being the best in any market we enter
Hiring and keeping only the most effective people
Others must benefit from our existence.


What We Offer In This Role

A full-time position on our Commercial team
Committed and remarkably talented colleagues.
Highly competitive compensation dependent on performance
An exciting, challenging and fulfilling career.
Investment in your development to ensure that you always remain the best in business.
Equity participation for strong contributors, ensuring our interests are all aligned long term.


Job Summary:

We are looking to recruit a talented Data Scientist to join our team in Dubai. As a data scientist at Cobblestone Energy, you will be responsible for developing and testing new trading strategies, discovering new knowledge, and creating bespoke data-tools and forecasts to enable our trading and asset dispatch teams to make the correct moves in the market.

Responsibilities:

Develop and implement advanced analytics and infrastructure solutions to support power and gas trading operations.
Collaborate with traders and other stakeholders to identify key business challenges and opportunities.
Use data science techniques to build predictive models and other solutions that drive value for our organization.
Develop systematic trading strategies across all of our markets.
Continuously monitor and evaluate the performance of analytics solutions and make recommendations for improvement.


Requirements:

Bachelor's or master's degree in a related field (e.g., Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics)
3+ years of experience as a Data Scientist
Strong experience with predictive modelling and optimization algorithms
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with stakeholders.
Experience mentoring and developing junior team members.
Proficiency in python programming language.
Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau
Experience in a power or gas trading markets is highly desirable but not required.


We offer a competitive salary, benefits package, and opportunities for professional growth and development. If you have a passion for power markets and data science, and are looking for a challenging and rewarding role, we encourage you to apply.

Title: Optimization Engineer
Description:
Attention all Optimization Engineer / Operations Research! 🚀 🌱 If you care about #sustainability & #climatechange and would like to make a difference with your software skills, we are looking for you! 🙌




Kadre landed at #Barcelona to find a #Optimization Engineer to join an #energy startup! ⛽ ⚡




The startup has a cloud hosted algorithm that needs to connect to thousands of EV chargers in real time. Data needs to be collected, analyzed by our predictive models, fed into the optimization algorithm, and displayed in real time to users via our app. Long term storage is also necessary to store a variety of EV usage data points. 📈




We are looking for candidates with a background in Operations Research (Mathematical Optimization) or Data Science (Machine Learning) who want to solve complex, multistep, decision making problems through constraint algorithms.




If you are someone who is driven by impact, thrives in a dynamic and collaborative work environment, and has a keen interest in contributing to the development of the optimization algorithm that powers our company, let's connect and chat! 😎




Requisitos




🔹Proficiency in Python




🔹Experience with optimization and performance algorithms. Optimization modeling experience in Python, GAMS, or MATLAB




🔹Background in mathematical optimization (mixed integer linear and nonlinear stochastic optimization, multi-objective optimization, robust optimization)




🔹Experience using Pyomo for optimization models




🔹Experience using Pandas and NumPy to manage large scale datasets




🔹Additional experience using DataScience frameworks is highly valued (Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, Scikit Learn, Keras, etc.)




🔹English is a must




Beneficios




🔹Preferred Hybrid Work




🔹Career development & training with DataCamp




🔹Benefits according to Spain regulations




👋 We are Kadre and we create more human experiences, redesigning the attraction and selection process by making focus on people.




Our motivation is to walk along the path with organizations and candidates, being an active part of their growth, identifying opportunities and joining them through our services.




We create experiences. We develop talent. We connect opportunities. ✨




We Are Kadre! 🌎 http //wearekadre.com/

Title: MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER GLOBAL DISTRIBUTION
Description:
En Mango inspiramos y unimos mediante nuestra pasión por el estilo y la cultura. Estamos en 118 países y nuestra presencia online se extiende a más de 80 países. Nuestro equipo está formado por personas de 112 nacionalidades y en un 80% por mujeres.

Buscamos un/a

MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER GLOBAL DISTRIBUTION

¿CÓMO SERIA TU DÍA A DÍA EN MANGO?

Estamos buscando un/a Machine Learning Engineer para unirse a nuestro equipo de Supply Chain, en colaboración con IT Data&Advanced Analytics.

Tu objetivo será desarrollar soluciones basadas en el procesamiento de datos para profesionalizar la distribución comercial y la logística en general.

¿QUÉ SE ESPERA DE UN MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER EN MANGO?

En tu día a día…

Participarás en la definición de la arquitectura de las soluciones de analítica avanzada desarrolladas por el squad y su posible integración con herramientas y aplicaciones desarrolladas por otros equipos.
Diseñarás, desarrollarás y mantendrás pipelines para la extracción, limpieza y transformación de datos.
Trabajarás con una gran variedad de datos (estructurados y no estructurados) relacionados con el producto y todo su ciclo de vida, desde la fase inicial de diseño hasta la venta en nuestros diferentes canales.
Definirás e implementarás mecanismos para la orquestación y monitorización de los procesos y aplicaciones desarrolladas.
Participarás en la automatización de tests, CI/CD y despliegue automático de nuestras aplicaciones.
Ayudarás en la definición y mejora de los estándares de calidad del código (test unitarios y de integración)
Estarás conectado a los últimos desarrollos en Big Data y MLOps e invertirás tiempo en traer nuevas tecnologías y mejores prácticas a Mango.


¿QUÉ ESPERAMOS DE TI?

Grado en Ingeniería Informática, Telecomunicaciones o similar.
Al menos 1 año de experiencia desarrollando en Python.
Experiencia en el desarrollo de ETL escalables con Spark (pyspark).
Experiencia en la construcción y el mantenimiento de cargas de datos complejas con un alto volumen y orquestando dependencias con Apache Airflow.
Experiencia con servicios de AWS (por ejemplo, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, ECR/ECS), y Databricks.
Se valora muy positivamente el interés en buenas prácticas de programación y desarrollo de software: tests, automatizaciones, pipelines en CI/CD (con Jenkins).
Experiencia en BBDD NoSQL, en Mango usamos MongoDB principalmente y Teradata como SQL db.
Experiencia en herramienta para el control de versiones (git).
Experiencia llevando a cabo proyectos que involucren algoritmos de Machine Learning.


¿QUÉ NOS HACE ESPECIALES?

Incorporación inmediata con contrato indefinido
Horario Flexible (entrada de 8h a 9h30 y salida de 17h a 18h30), jornada intensiva los viernes (de 8h a 9h hasta las 14h / 15h) y mayoría de vigilias de festivos
Posibilidad de Teletrabajo
Descuento del 25% en todas nuestras líneas además de un Market de muestrario para renovar tu armario dos veces al año
Servicio de comedor y cocina en las instalaciones de central. La empresa subvenciona parte del menú diario, así como los artículos de cafetería
Retribución flexible con ventajas fiscales: seguro médico, formación, descuento comedor, guarderías etc.
Transporte gratuito de empresa desde Barcelona y el Vallés
Oportunidades constantes de desarrollo con retos muy variados que generan aprendizaje en el puesto de trabajo y cursos específicos en función de tus necesidades
Workshops, meetups, comunidades de prácticas, team buildings y company meetings sobre transformación digital, moda y actividades de nuestros equipos
Servicio médico propio, servicio de fisioterapia una vez a la semana, sala de fitness y vestuarios en nuestras oficinas centrales
Formarás parte de una empresa líder en el sector de la moda, dinámica, en plena innovación, con gran concienciación y realizando acciones hacia la sostenibilidad con un ambiente de trabajo cercano, inspirador y ambicioso


You got it?

We like you!

You got it?

Title: Python Developer (Odoo)
Description:
Som IT Cooperatiu is a new project that aims to be a referent in the design of business processes and the development of IT tools within the social economy.

It is a project promoted by the cooperatives Som Mobilitat, Som Connexió and Finances Ètiques Foundation, with the support of Som Energia.




We are looking for two Python programmers with experience in the ERP domain (ideally Odoo/OpenERP) and experience in Django.




We are looking for people with an entrepreneurial mindset who want to use their talents to make the world a better place. We want to build IT tools that help social economy projects scale up. We are committed to free software and working together with other entities and cooperatives, with the aim to become a tool for change.




Would you like to join us?




Main tasks

Design and build modules within the ERP Odoo
Maintenance of the developed code
Integration between the ERP and third party systems
Provide technical support to ERP implementations
Backend web development with Django




Technologies

python
postgresql
Git
ansible
odoo
django




What are we looking for?

Experience and solid foundation in object-oriented programming
Experience developing web applications with open source frameworks in Python
Familiarity with Unix/Linux command line
Knowledge of other programming languages will be valued
Experience in the design and execution of unit and integration tests
Confidence with Git and Git-based development workflows




We will also value

Having contributed to Open Source projects
Interest in improving the ecosystem of the social economy
Intermediate command of the English language
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Good communication skills




Working conditions

Full time
Remuneration (according to experience): €24,000 - €34,000 gross per year
Flexible schedule
Hybrid job with offices in Mataró, El Prat de Llobregat or Barcelona







Join us by sending your CV and motivation letter to: info@somit.coop

Title: MLOps Engineer
Description:
Sony AI are seeking a proven MLOps Engineer to join our newest team in Barcelona and work with our Gastronomy Flagship Project team.




You should be someone who has worked closely with innovation in the AI space, with experience building ML models, CD/CI, data engineering, and close partnering with research scientists to transition prototypes into quality production code. You should enjoy exploring the forefront of what is technologically possible, thrive in the face of the uncertainty and the experimental nature of working in a research environment, and find purpose in translating between novel research ideas and professional engineering standards and practices.




We offer the opportunity to join a responsible AI lab, where your manager will support you to make an impact and be recognised for your work. You’ll enjoy working with a diverse and international team in a flexible setting recognizing different personalities and lifestyles.




Find out more: https://ai.sony/projects/gastronomy/, and if you’re ready to take on the challenge with us, we want to hear from you.




You will:




Transition research prototypes to production-quality features, improving scalability, robustness, and performance along the way.
Incorporate open-source tools, automation, and cloud resources to speed up development and deployment.
Work with platform engineering to implement continuous integration and delivery to our ML cloud platform to limit manual testing and troubleshooting.
Guide and mentor research scientists regarding good engineering practices, serve as torchbearer for a modern and inclusive engineering culture.
Closely collaborate with colleagues in Spain, US, Japan, and Switzerland.
Travel to other Sony sites and international conferences.




You will bring:




Bachelor’s degree in engineering or computer science.
Plus: Master’s degree in engineering or computer science.
Three years of post-degree or equivalent engineering experience in a similar role.
Experience with building and deploying machine learning models.
Strong plus: Experience with building and deploying data pipeline infrastructure for data storage, management, and processing (particularly for text data).
Strong Python skills.
Experience working with cloud services (like AWS and GCP) and with container technologies (like Kubernetes and Docker).
Plus: Experience with automation technologies (like Ansible and Terraform).
Strong plus: Experience working with research scientists.
Plus: Experience with the supervision of interns and/or junior engineers.




Key attributes:




The ability and the willingness to work with research scientists in an ambitious research project with several unknowns, developing mutual understanding and a joint culture.
The ability to deliver on tight deadlines and adapt to evolving or changing requirements.
The ability and the willingness to work as a member of a distributed team spanning several time zones and bringing together people from diverse cultural and personal backgrounds.
Excellent written and oral communication skills in English, as well as interpersonal skills including the ability to articulate to both technical and non-technical audiences
Plus: Japanese language skills.




Your new office




In our Barcelona office you can enjoy a modern and open working environment with unbeatable views of the city. Located in Avenida Diagonal, in an energy efficient building, it is very convenient to reach the office by public transport. You can enjoy your lunch or coffee in our office kitchen, on the terrace next to the lobby, or you can walk to one of the many restaurants and shopping centres nearby.




Life at Sony




We ensure competitive salaries and benefits by using established benchmarking. We encourage healthy work-life balance supported by hybrid and flexible working policies. We are a positive community who dream big together, respect each other, and enjoy a collaborative culture.




We like to celebrate our colleagues who make a real difference using our recognition platform. We also provide access to numerous services and platforms for all aspects of wellbeing. We listen to our people through conversations and surveys, respect their suggestions, then act on them. We also provide allowances for volunteering days so that our staff can support the causes they are most passionate about.




You can build your career around you with our fantastic range of learning & personal development programs to enhance your skills. We also encourage our staff to try exciting new roles, in a wide range of countries, with a supportive mobility team to support you if you take that leap!




Bring your uniqueness to Sony




We are passionate about creating a culture that promotes equity and cultivates inclusion, diversity, and belonging. We want employees with diverse backgrounds and perspectives that will stimulate innovation and have a direct impact on our creation of social value to fulfil Sony’s purpose – ‘to fill the world with emotion, through the power of creativity and technology’. We want you to bring your unique self to work and help shape our culture.




We are Sony Europe.




Our people collaborate in an environment of respect, integrity, and open-mindedness. Diverse teams from all over Europe are the driving force for our business, and we embrace the differences that make each of us original and unique.




With offices in 28 European countries, Sony Europe caters to consumer, professional, semiconductor and healthcare markets with innovative electronics products and solutions. Our European laboratories research and develop new technologies and capabilities that contributes to the Sony Group and important issues on a planetary scale.




Bring your passion, creativity and ambitions to Sony Europe. Apply now, and let’s create the future together.




Show more Show less

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
At Bayer we’re visionaries, driven to solve the world’s toughest challenges and striving for a world where ,Health for all, Hunger for none’ is no longer a dream, but a real possibility. We’re doing it with energy, curiosity and sheer dedication, always learning from unique perspectives of those around us, expanding our thinking, growing our capabilities and redefining ‘impossible’. There are so many reasons to join us. If you’re hungry to build a varied and meaningful career in a community of brilliant and diverse minds to make a real difference, there’s only one choice.




Senior Machine Learning Engineer




At Bayer we’re visionaries, driven to solve the world’s toughest challenges and striving for a world where ,Health for all, Hunger for none’ is no longer a dream, but a real possibility. We’re doing it with energy, curiosity and sheer dedication, always learning from unique perspectives of those around us, expanding our thinking, growing our capabilities and redefining ‘impossible’. There are so many reasons to join us. If you’re hungry to build a varied and meaningful career in a community of brilliant and diverse minds to make a real difference, there’s only one choice.




Senior Machine Learning Engineer




Why Bayer?




“Health for all and Hunger for none” is our mission at Bayer. Every day, we are privileged to work on purposeful cutting-edge projects to bring our mission to life. Join us at the new Bayer Digital Hub in Warsaw to have a career that you can put your passion into practice and make an impact using Science for a better life.




The Decision Science unit at Bayer Pharmaceutical is a one stop shop for all enterprise advanced analytics projects. We work across all functions in Bayer from Medical Affairs to Pharmacovigilance to Regulatory Affairs, Radiology & Oncology and others. We solve hard analytical problems and build solutions with the mission to improve the overall efficiency and decision making in the company. The focus of this team lies in applications involving Natural Language Processing and/or Computer Vision techniques and patient Real World Data but does not exclude other areas of advanced analytics. If you are interested in joining a dynamic team to industrialize analytics solutions, we would like to hear from you.




For our global team we are looking for a ML Engineer to strengthen the global Digital Transformation & IT – Pharma organization. The position is located in Barcelona.




Your Tasks And Responsibilities




Drive and lead business and innovation projects in the areas of Medical Affairs, Pharmacovigilance or Radiology to design and implement AI & Data solutions, i.e., fit-for-purpose AI and data solutions which are embedded into digital products
Technically lead projects, other (junior) ML Engineers and Data Scientists applying an agile approach
Lead scaling up activities transforming data science prototypes to end to end solutions embedded in business processes by applying hands-on cloud engineering and leveraging skills across a large IT unit working with Business Domain Expert in their daily work.
Leads and implements data engineering, data modeling, and AI and data infrastructure tasks in a cloud native manner.
Leads and implements the deployment of machine learning (ML) / deep learning (DL) models and helps improve existing ML/DL models in production.
Design and Implement Cloud based Architectures ready to host ML models and pipelines.
Establish strong link with stakeholders in the business to help shape and execute the digital agenda strategy.
Create opportunities for digital product development by identifying pain points in the business to improve efficiency and decision making.
Collaborates with scientists and analysts performing business analysis and domain modeling.
Publish innovative methodologies, architectures and scientific discoveries in peer reviewed journals.




Who You Are




You are somebody (m/f/d) passionate about scaling up, being hands-on and deploying AI & Data solutions and creating the necessary data foundations to make the world a better and more efficient place. You are interested in joining an energetic team of data scientists and other machine learning engineers working across disciplines from Natural Language processing or Computer Vision to working with patient Real World Evidence data and others. You describe yourself as hands-on, able to code (both infrastructure as code and solution code), solution orientated and able to analyze data. You like to explore and try out new technologies and concepts. You can present your results and outline potential solutions for deployment to the business.




Bachelor with long term experience, Master with long term experience or PhD with several years of industry experience in machine learning, statistics, applied mathematics, or computer science, with strong knowledge of machine learning and cloud engineering
Strong track records leading & implementing the delivery of groundbreaking machine learning or data projects.
Well established knowledge in statistical Machine Learning and/or Deep Learning, in particular in Natural Language Processing or Computer Vision
Strong experience in Data Engineering (connecting to new data sources, storing the data in the Cloud, choose the right storage engine and transforming and cleaning the data)
Very good knowledge of Cloud native application architecture and being able to create ML solutions in the Cloud
Very good software engineering knowledge in Python, familiar with at least one Cloud framework (e.g., AWS, GCP or Azure) as well as proficiency with machine learning and deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch
Strong business analyst skills and strong experience interacting with very diverse customers is required
Strong skills in presentation of results and outlining of solutions to the business
Ability to work in an interdisciplinary and agile environment
Fluent in English both written and spoken




In exchange we will offer you:




A flexible hybrid work model (Home Office) including the option to work anywhere within the EU or outside the EU for extended periods of time (up to 3 months).
Career development with wide access to professional development tools & trainings.
Competitive salary, bonus & top performers awards on recognition in case of exceeding contribution.
Subsidized meals in the office
2 additional annual leave days after 3 years in the company.
Life & Accident Insurance
100% salary coverage in the event of medical leave
In-house medical service at Bayer premises open 5 days a week for 8 hours.
24-hour psychological, medical, and social care for employees and family.
Annual medical check-up
Subsidized sports groups, physiotherapy service, online gym.
At Bayer office: fitness room, parcel lockers, dry-cleaning/laundry service, bicycle parking.




Our inclusive culture at Bayer:




Bayer is an equal opportunity employer. We care about inclusion in terms of gender, age, race, skin color, nationality, religion, marital status, sexual orientation, background, physical or mental disabilities and on every other grounds. Applying for our position, we assure you that we will assess your application solely on the basis of your competencies.




YOUR APPLICATION




This is your opportunity to tackle the world’s biggest challenges with us: Maintaining our health, feeding growing populations and slowing the rate of climate change. You have a voice, ideas and perspectives and we want to hear them. Because our success begins with you. Be part of something big. Be Bayer.




Bayer welcomes applications from all individuals, regardless of race, national origin, gender, age, physical characteristics, social origin, disability, union membership, religion, family status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression or any unlawful criterion under applicable law. We are committed to treating all applicants fairly and avoiding discrimination.




Location:




Spain : Cataluña : Barcelona




Division:




Enabling Functions




Reference Code:




788644
