Title: Fullstack developer
Description:
Descripción del puesto




Desde Selectjoob, estamos colaborando con una empresa biotecnológica, que opera en el mercado de diagnóstico y tiene su sede en Barcelona. Está creando un negocio sostenible y responsable con el objetivo de unir la investigación genómica y la aplicación clínica para ayudar a nuestros conciudadanos.




Que buscamos




Necesitamos incorporar al equipo una persona con conocimientos sólidos en Backend (PHP-Laravel) y con nociones Frontend (JavaScript, HTML y Bootstrap).




La nueva incorporación realizará las siguientes funciones




Participación en todas las fases del ciclo de vida del producto. Tanto diseño e implementación de nuevos evolutivos como mantenimiento y desarrollo de correctivos así como desarrollo de pruebas y construcción de la arquitectura de la aplicación.
Soporte y trabajo conjunto con los usuarios finales del software para su mejora continua.
Trabajos de integración y comunicaciones con otros software y herramientas principalmente mediante APIs.


Conocimientos tecnicos requeridos

Mínimo 2 año de trabajo con PHP idealmente con Laravel
Debe tener nociones de Front - Javascript, HTML

Conocimientos sólidos en bases de datos relacionales MySQL
Diseño e implementación de pruebas unitarias y funcionales en PHPUnit
Desarrollo y consumo de Api REST
conocimientos básicos en linux





Que podemos ofrecer




Contrato indefinido
Proyecto estable
Retribución flexible
Dos días teletrabajo a la semana
Horario de 09 a 18 flexible
Salario entre 25k a 27k

Show more Show less
HTML:
Descripción del puesto


Desde Selectjoob, estamos colaborando con una empresa biotecnológica, que opera en el mercado de diagnóstico y tiene su sede en Barcelona. Está creando un negocio sostenible y responsable con el objetivo de unir la investigación genómica y la aplicación clínica para ayudar a nuestros conciudadanos.


Que buscamos


Necesitamos incorporar al equipo una persona con conocimientos sólidos en Backend (PHP-Laravel) y con nociones Frontend (JavaScript, HTML y Bootstrap).


La nueva incorporación realizará las siguientes funciones


  • Participación en todas las fases del ciclo de vida del producto. Tanto diseño e implementación de nuevos evolutivos como mantenimiento y desarrollo de correctivos así como desarrollo de pruebas y construcción de la arquitectura de la aplicación.
  • Soporte y trabajo conjunto con los usuarios finales del software para su mejora continua.
  • Trabajos de integración y comunicaciones con otros software y herramientas principalmente mediante APIs.

Conocimientos tecnicos requeridos
  • Mínimo 2 año de trabajo con PHP idealmente con Laravel
    • Debe tener nociones de Front - Javascript, HTML
  • Conocimientos sólidos en bases de datos relacionales MySQL
  • Diseño e implementación de pruebas unitarias y funcionales en PHPUnit
  • Desarrollo y consumo de Api REST
  • conocimientos básicos en linux


Que podemos ofrecer


  • Contrato indefinido
  • Proyecto estable
  • Retribución flexible
  • Dos días teletrabajo a la semana
  • Horario de 09 a 18 flexible
  • Salario entre 25k a 27k

Title: Frontend Developer
Description:
Location: Barcelona

Type of working day: Completa

SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONSEducation level required: FP / Grado superior de programación.

Additional training: Al menos 1 año de experiencia como desarrollador front-end con sólidos conocimientos de HTML5, CSS y Javascript.

Technical skills: Desarrollo de código limpio, modular y reutilizable. - Maquetación en HTML5 y CSS3. - Sólidos conocimientos de Javascript y ReactJS (con Redux). - AJAX e integración con APIs. - Desarrollo y maquetación de web responsive. - Desarrollo y maquetación cross-browser/dispositivo. - Control de versiones (GIT). - Nivel técnico de inglés. - Desarrollo frontend completamente funcional a partir de wireframes y prototipos. SE VALORARÁ: - Conocimientos Backend (PHP, NodeJS). - MySQL (o bases cualquier BD relacional). - Unit Testing. - Docker. - DICOM.

Interpersonal skills: Buena actitud, ganas de aprender y de enseñar.

Languages: Español, Catalán, Inglés (técnico).

FunctionsLas principales funciones serán, junto al resto del equipo técnico, del desarrollo de nuevas aplicaciones y ampliar y mantener los productos actuales de la empresa, así como la colaboración en el análisis y diseño de los nuevos proyectos y/o productos.

We offer youAlma Medical Imaging es una empresa especializada en el desarrollo de software de visualización médica. Actualmente contamos con varias aplicaciones con un largo recorrido en el mercado y damos servicio a clientes de todo el mundo.

Buscamos a una persona proactiva, con experiencia como Front End , a la que le apasione la tecnología y los retos tecnológicos.

Ofrecemos la oportunidad de trabajar con un equipo joven, con experiencia en el sector de la con el que podrás asumir

nuevas responsabilidades y seguir creciendo como profesional.

Salario y puesto de trabajos fijos
Formación continuada
Trabajo en remoto la mayor parte de los días de la semana
Sesión periódica de equipo (team building) a cargo de la empresa
Incorporación a una empresa en crecimiento y con equipo especializado
Participación en congresos y seminarios especializados

I give my consent to Alma IT Systems S.L. to send commercial news and / or new promotions of your products and services

ALMA IT SISTEMS, SL as data manager will process your data in order to answer your query or request. The legitimate basis is your consent which you can revoke at any time by communicating it to ******. No data will be transferred to third parties except under legal obligation. You can access, rectify and delete your data, as well as exercise other rights by consulting the additional and detailed information on data protection in our Privacy Policy .

Title: Software Engineer, SWR
Description:
Qorvo (Nasdaq: QRVO) supplies innovative semiconductor solutions that make a better world possible. We combine product and technology leadership, systems-level expertise and global manufacturing scale to quickly solve our customers' most complex technical challenges. Qorvo serves diverse high-growth segments of large global markets, including consumer electronics, smart home/IoT, automotive, EVs, battery-powered appliances, network infrastructure, healthcare and aerospace/defense. Visit www.qorvo.com to learn how our diverse and innovative team is helping connect, protect and power our planet.




Software Engineer




Qorvo is All Around You! We manufacture innovative RF solutions at the center of connectivity to enable high-performance applications for advanced wireless devices, wired and wireless networks and defense radar and communications for 5G networks, cloud computing, the Internet of Things, and other emerging applications. We are a global company thriving on a culture of innovation, diversity, and inclusion. Our people are always at the core of Qorvo’s innovation. Qorvo is a place to stretch your imagination and push boundaries to achieve success. Learn more about Top 10 Reasons to make a career at Qorvo.




Summary




Qorvo’s EDA Software Automation team is seeking a talented software engineer. The ideal candidate chosen for this role will provide user friendly, seamlessly integrated software for improved design methodologies, faster visualization of results, process control and improvements, and general automation. The candidate will use Python, and C++ in conjunction with existing Software and APIs.




Key Roles And Responsibilities




Researching, designing, implementing, and managing software programs
Deploying software tools, processes, and metrics
Writing and implementing efficient code
Working closely with other developers and engineers
Testing and evaluating programs
Determining operational practicality
Provide comprehensive support to internal customers; achieve resolution to outstanding problems, or issues




Technical Knowledge/Skills/Abilities Required




Excellent Python or C++ programming capabilities
Experience with software product development experience preferred
Well versed in Object Oriented Design (OOD), programming and design patterns
Experience in SCRUM (Agile) development process
Extensive experience in the full life cycle of the software design process including requirement analysis, design, prototyping, coding, documentation, implementation, and maintenance
Strong Version control skills (GIT, Perforce)
Strong familiarity with the use of IDEs
Excellent debugging and problem-solving skills
Strong understanding of algorithms and data-structures




Personal Skills




Self-motivated, independent, proactive, detail oriented, and responsible team-player
Excellent analytical skills
Comfortable working in a dynamic and fast paced environment
Passion for innovation and emerging technologies
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Able to handle multiple priorities
Proficient in English




Desired Experiences




Excellent communication and presentation skills
Familiarity with the use of PyCharm or Visual Studio
Good understanding of electromagnetics or Physics
Performed unit testing in past development projects
Oracle/SQL familiarity
Exposure to Docker and containers
Batch/Shell scripting experience
QT or similar U/I development




Required Education & Experience




BS ior MS in Computer Science with a SW development focus




Position Location: Barcelona




Relocation Eligible: Yes




MAKE A DIFFERENCE AT QORVO




We are Qorvo. We do more than create innovative RF and Power solutions for the mobile, defense and infrastructure markets – we are a place to innovate and shape the future of wireless communications. It starts with our employees. As a unified global team, we bring a commitment to excellence, growth and a passion for creating what's next. Explore the possibilities with us.

MAKE A DIFFERENCE AT QORVO


We are Qorvo. We do more than create innovative RF and Power solutions for the mobile, defense and infrastructure markets – we are a place to innovate and shape the future of wireless communications. It starts with our employees. As a unified global team, we bring a commitment to excellence, growth and a passion for creating what's next. Explore the possibilities with us.

Title: Programador Software (H/D)
Description:
AXXON TECH selecciona SOFTWARE DEVELOPER (H/D) para empresa tecnológica ubicada en Girona (Opción TELETRABAJO 100 ).

Reportando al Project Manager la persona seleccionada se integrará en el equipo técnico desarrollando módulos y nuevas funcionalidades de software para un cliente industrial trabajando en entorno .NET en servidor físico y en el cloud Azure.

FUNCIONES

Desarrollo bajo distintos lenguajes de programación y migración de bases de datos.
Documentación de las especificaciones técnicas para su posterior programación.
Metodología SCRUM para asegurar la adaptación de los cambios a las especificaciones del cliente.
Preparar y producir versiones de componentes de software (Git).
Apoyar la mejora continua a través de la investigación de nuevas alternativas y tecnologías.

EXPERIENCIA mínimo 3 años trabajando en entorno .Net y especialmente valorable en desarrollo de Software en Cloud.

SE OFRECE

Proyecto estable e incorporación directa por empresa.
Plan de carrera en empresa consolidada y en crecimiento.
Opción teletrabajo 100 .
Horario entre 9h y 18h.

Formación Ingeniería Informática y/o similares.

Habilidades

Programación en entrono .NET
C#
SQL
Azure

Pensamos en una persona con iniciativa y motivada por formar parte de un proyecto estable e integrarse en equipo de trabajo joven y dinámico.

Net, C#

Title: Full Stack Development Intern
Description:
Who are we?




The Keenfolks is an award-winning digital transformation agency based in Barcelona, NY & Mexico City. We disrupt the market by creating a new business category Digital Gap Management. We help global companies to outpace consumer evolution speed by activating digital transformation initiatives.




We have been recently recognized as the Agency of the Year in 2021, by Digiday marketing & advertising Europe awards 🚀




Today, we are more than 90 Keenfolks and we all share three core values:




Find meaningful purpose in everything
Challenge "Good enough" to become great
Deliver incomparable value to clients, individuals, and society 🌏




We are looking for a Full Stack Development Intern to join our team and play a key role in work in enhancing and improving the functionality of existing systems and contribute to the team’s software development process.




As a Full Stack Development Intern, your primary role will be to work closely with our IT team to assist in the development and maintenance of web applications by writing code, testing, and debugging, and working on both front-end and back-end technologies.




What You Will Be Doing 🚀




Build functional and sustainable web applications with web development best practices.
Transform app designs into front-end code with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical requirements or UX design.
Debug errors, troubleshoot issues, and perform routine performance optimizations.
Support back-end developers with coding and troubleshooting.
Managing tasks for multiple clients simultaneously.




You will rock in this role if you have 💥




Experience developing modern, responsive, and cross-browser-compatible websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Good understanding of Asynchronous JavaScript.
Knowledge of at least one JavaScript framework such as Svelte, React, or Angular.
Knowledge of Python with an understanding of at least one Python web framework such as Django or Flask.
Familiarity with CSS preprocessors such as Sass, Less, or Stylus.
Experience working with version control software, GitHub, and CI/CD.
A passion for the web and an eagerness to learn about the latest technologies like Web3, NFTs, etc.
Ability to work autonomously and manage your workload and deadlines effectively.
Be-self driven, work under uncertainty, and love learning and self-improvement!
Fluent in English.




How Being Part Of The Keenfolks Looks Like 🤩




Dynamic, young, and international environment with +26 nationalities in our Barcelona office!
Work-from-home flexibility: 2 weekly office days
Learning & Development policy: language courses and focused seminars!
Free lunch at our beautiful office in Barcelona
Free Friday afternoon
Office activities: yoga, padel, ping pong, and much more!!
1 monthly after-work gathering with pizza and drinks
Annual bicing
Fresh fruit, coffee, and tea
Birthday gift
An entrepreneurial environment that encourages continuous innovation
A company culture built on passion, trust, and constructive freedom
Career development and continuous opportunities to grow 🚀




Your Attitude




We believe in pushing our boundaries, we believe that innovation requires vulnerability and so, we take calculated risks. Here at The Keenfolks, we're constantly in search of greatness and never settle for just being good. We recognize and reward those that consider themselves to be change-makers and experimental in their approach, therefore, we're keen to connect with innovators…someone that takes the learning in each experience, coupled with them having an entrepreneurial mindset.




Diversity Matters




The Keenfolks is an equal employer. It is the policy of The Keenfolks to give equal opportunities in career and development regardless of gender identity, gender reassignment, sexual identity, sexual orientation, marital status, race, ethnic origin, age, political view, religion, disability, pregnancy, maternity, and paternity. We believe in true equality for all, and so, through our culture, corporate social responsibility, and day-to-day activities, we hope and strive to have a positive impact on today's society.




WANT TO KNOW MORE?




Follow us on LinkedIn & Instagram @the_keenfolks to learn more about our culture & values! 🧘🏽

Title: Programador Junior Java
Description:
¿Quiénes somos?




Nuestra misión es la de ser especialistas en la comercialización y distribución de materiales empleados en la ejecución y mantenimiento de instalaciones de electricidad, climatización, conducción de fluidos (gas/agua), redes VDI-Telecomunicaciones, energías renovables y gestión de la energía; dando asesoramiento técnico, y aportando soluciones a nuestros clientes en todo el territorio peninsular e islas a través de la calidad en el servicio.




Qué estamos buscando: Queremos incorporar en nuestra central ubicada en Barberà del Vallès un Programador Junior Java con la siguiente misión: realización de integración de datos entre backend y el ecommerce.




Tus Responsabilidades Serán




Realización de tareas de integración entre el backend y el ecommerce.
Resolución de incidencias.
Testeo de nuevos desarrollos.
Soporte en áreas de desarrollo e implementación de nuevas funcionalidades.




En Tu Día a Día Usarás




Las herramientas de gestión de la plataforma SAP Hybris para el manejo de los datos del ecommerce.
El lenguaje SQL para la obtención de datos en el backend.
El entorno de programación Eclipse para programar en Java.




Perfil Buscado Ciclo Formativo de Grado Superior en Informática.




Formación Complementaria




Conocimiento en Java.




Bases de datos, lenguaje SQL.




Conocimientos de javascript y jquery.




¿Qué Ofrecemos?







Formar parte de una empresa líder en su sector.




Oportunidades de carrera y desarrollo profesional.




Entorno de trabajo dinámico y en crecimiento.




Trabajo Presencial

Title: Programador/a Backend C++
Description:
¿Eres Programador/a, con experiencia en C++, resides en la zona de Barcelona y alrededores y crees que es un buen momento para iniciar un nuevo reto profesional? En Melt Group te estamos buscando!




Empecemos por la empresa:

Se trata de una empresa tecnológica con sede en Barcelona, 25 años de experiencia y más de 200 empleados. Cuenta con dos líneas de negocio distintas, proporciona soluciones de movilidad y recarga de vehículos eléctricos. Se encuentran en plenos crecimiento exponencial. Se dividen en dos áreas, la de producto y la de desarrollo, en la que cuentan con un equipo de 40 personas.




Hablemos del proyecto:

Están en búsqueda de un/a Programador/a Backend C++, para incorporar al equipo de software. Te encargarás de diseñar y desarrollar aplicaciones para equipos de recarga de vehículos eléctricos, generar la documentación necesaria vinculada con la solución implementada, y ayudar en al definición, análisis y diseño de la arquitectura de software. Estarás presente en todas las fases de ciclo de desarrollo.




La experiencia que puedes aportar:

Formación en Ingeniería Industrial, Informática o Telecomunicaciones.
3 años de experiencia en desarrollo con C++ (a partir de versión 17).
Nivel de inglés B2.
Experiencia en control de versiones y flujos de trabajo con Git.
Conocimiento en programación orientada a objetos.
Experiencia en entornos Linux.
Se valorará conocimientos en Docker, protocolos HTTP, lenguaje QT, MQTT y Python.




¿Te preguntas qué podemos ofrecerte? Ahí va:

Salario de 30.000€ a 38.000€ según perfil.
Contrato indefinido a tiempo completo.
Proyecto estable a largo plazo.
2 días de trabajo en oficina y 4 días de teletrabajo.
Beneficios sociales (seguro médico, menús subvencionados, formaciones)




Y una vez que aplico, ¿Cómo avanzamos?

Sencillo, cuando revisemos tu candidatura, te llamaremos para un contacto telefónico inicial. Después, presentaremos tu candidatura a nuestro cliente, con el que tendrás una primera entrevista telemática con RRHH, y después habrá una segunda presencial con el equipo técnico.




¡Estamos deseando conocerte!

Show more Show less
HTML:
¿Eres Programador/a, con experiencia en C++, resides en la zona de Barcelona y alrededores y crees que es un buen momento para iniciar un nuevo reto profesional? En Melt Group te estamos buscando!


Empecemos por la empresa:

Se trata de una empresa tecnológica con sede en Barcelona, 25 años de experiencia y más de 200 empleados. Cuenta con dos líneas de negocio distintas, proporciona soluciones de movilidad y recarga de vehículos eléctricos. Se encuentran en plenos crecimiento exponencial. Se dividen en dos áreas, la de producto y la de desarrollo, en la que cuentan con un equipo de 40 personas.


Hablemos del proyecto:

Están en búsqueda de un/a Programador/a Backend C++, para incorporar al equipo de software. Te encargarás de diseñar y desarrollar aplicaciones para equipos de recarga de vehículos eléctricos, generar la documentación necesaria vinculada con la solución implementada, y ayudar en al definición, análisis y diseño de la arquitectura de software. Estarás presente en todas las fases de ciclo de desarrollo.


La experiencia que puedes aportar:

  • Formación en Ingeniería Industrial, Informática o Telecomunicaciones.
  • 3 años de experiencia en desarrollo con C++ (a partir de versión 17).
  • Nivel de inglés B2.
  • Experiencia en control de versiones y flujos de trabajo con Git.
  • Conocimiento en programación orientada a objetos.
  • Experiencia en entornos Linux.
  • Se valorará conocimientos en Docker, protocolos HTTP, lenguaje QT, MQTT y Python.


¿Te preguntas qué podemos ofrecerte? Ahí va:

  • Salario de 30.000€ a 38.000€ según perfil.
  • Contrato indefinido a tiempo completo.
  • Proyecto estable a largo plazo.
  • 2 días de trabajo en oficina y 4 días de teletrabajo.
  • Beneficios sociales (seguro médico, menús subvencionados, formaciones)


Y una vez que aplico, ¿Cómo avanzamos?

Sencillo, cuando revisemos tu candidatura, te llamaremos para un contacto telefónico inicial. Después, presentaremos tu candidatura a nuestro cliente, con el que tendrás una primera entrevista telemática con RRHH, y después habrá una segunda presencial con el equipo técnico.


¡Estamos deseando conocerte!

Title: Software Development Engineer
Description:
At Werfen in Clinical Software Business Unit we are committed to developing secure, efficient, and innovative clinical applications and laboratory instrumentation systems. Our solutions enhance patient care and facilitate the management of information in hospitals and laboratories around the world.




We are looking for a Software Development Engineer, to produce scalable software solutions. You will be part of a development team that is in charge of a software product that manages clinical information and provides therapeutic data to the doctors.

Under the supervision of the team leader, he/she participates in the development of the product following the methodologies used in the project and participates in the continuous improvement process.







https://www.werfen.com/en

https://www.werfen.com/en/clinical-software-landing




Education: Engineer, Computer Science or another Technical degree.




Experience:

At least 4 years of experience developing client-server applications using Java 1.6+ / JavaEE. In-depth knowledge of EJB, JMS and JMX would be valuable.
Experience with databases (PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQLServer) and different application servers (Wildfly, JBoss, WebSphere).
Experience with IDE’s such as IntelliJ Idea.
Experience developing web applications using Angular
Knowledge of and experience with the Gradle compilation/packaging system
Experience in Agile methodology.
Knowledge of and experience with source/version control systems (i.e. Git).







Key Accountabilities:

Be a key part of a team where you will:

Develops SW with high quality for a regulated environment.
Participates in the team meetings
Defines new features/changes with all involved stakeholders
Updates the requirements documentation when needed.
Defines architecture for new modules
Implements automatic testing
Participates in troubleshooting and performance improvement processes.




The ideal candidate for this position:

Interest to learn and understand business areas to provide value-add solutions
Driving Innovation
Accountability
Highly organized and detail-oriented, with the ability to multi-task.
Proactivity, but still work well in a team-oriented environment.
Good communication skills
Flexibility and adaptability to a fast-changing environment
Good English speaking and writing skills.




What we offer:

3 days working from home.
A meaningful project that will impact the quality of laboratory software medicine worldwide
Multicultural and friendly team
Exciting opportunities for professional development.
Ongoing training
Social benefits: Canteen, nursery check, English training...




Our Purpose: We contribute to the advancement of patient care around the world through innovative specialized diagnostics




JOIN US!

Title: Mobile Application Developer - REACT NATIVE
Description:
redarbor es la #1 compañía HR Tech en Latam.




Ayudamos a 35 millones de personas al mes a encontrar un trabajo y a más de 100.000 empresas a reclutar y retener el mejor talento.




Nuestros proyectos

Somos líderes en Sites y App’s de empleo Infojobs (#1 en Brasil) y Computrabajo (líder en Latinoamérica), Software de RRHH (SherlockHR, pandapé, HolmesHR).




Redarbor en cifras




2013 fundada
más de 600 colaboradores
11 oficinas
HR Tech 1# en Latam y 3# grupo mundial de empleo online
Ayudamos a más de 35 millones de personas al mes a encontrar un trabajo
Somos la 5 mejor empresa para trabajar en España, según GPTW.




¿A quién buscamos?

A un/a Mobile Application Developer que tenga pasión por las tecnologías móviles y quiera formar parte de unos de los proyectos clave de la compañía y con gran volumen de usuarios y tráfico.




¿Tu rol?

Diseñar y desarrollar funcionalidades para la app de candidatos
Colaborar con equipos multifuncionales para definir nuevas soluciones, así como escalar soluciones existentes
Desarrollar funcionalidades en plataforma nativa (Java/Kotlin u ObjectiveC/Swift) y puentearlas a React Native
Trabajar con fuentes de datos y API internas
Integrar bibliotecas React-Native y nativas (Android e iOS)
Añadir telemetría para mayor entendimiento del uso de la app por parte de sus usuarios
Resolver bugs y evaluar la rearquitectura de componentes y servicios cuando sea necesario
Realizar profiling y optimización de componentes y servicios de la app
Participar en la mejora de automatización de los flujos CI/CD en Azure DevOps




Eres la persona que buscamos si:




Tienes experiencia demostrable en desarrollo de software utilizando React Native 0.59+
Has utilizado el patrón state reducer, idealmente con hooks React (valorable Redux)
Has utilizado fuentes de datos remotos a través de APIs REST
Has integrado bibliotecas y APIs de terceros (Firebase, Facebook, Loco/Localise, etc.)
Tienes curiosidad sobre arquitecturas, tendencias y tecnologías emergentes del ecosistema mobile
Posees sólidos conocimientos del ciclo de vida completo de desarrollo para Android y/o iOS (separación de entornos, firmado, publicación…)




Valorable:




Conocimientos en React Native Testing Library o Jest
Desarrollo con SDKs nativos (Android y/o iOS)
Experiencia con OAuth2 u otros sistemas de autenticación y autorización
Fundamentos de criptografía (cifrado, firma, hashing…)




Nuestros beneficios:

Contrato Indefinido + flexibilidad horaria + día libre en tu CUMPLEAÑOS
Vacaciones:
23 días laborables de VACACIONES
Días adicionales de vacaciones, por cada 2 años cumplidos y hasta un máximo de 5 días.
Jornada Intensiva; viernes, Navidad, Semana Santa, Julio y Agosto
Teletrabajo:
Trabajamos 2 días en la oficina y 3 en casa.
Se podrá hacer full teletrabajo durante las semanas de jornada intensiva de navidad (del 24 de diciembre al Día de Reyes) y Semana Santa.
Opción de hacer teletrabajo durante los puentes.
Full teletrabajo hasta 4 semanas al año, con posibilidad de hacerlas todas seguidas o en tramos de 2 semanas.
Plan de formación: un conjunto de más de 19 cursos presenciales + formación online con Udemy para realizar formaciones específicas desde casa y de forma ilimitada.
Idiomas: clases online de inglés y portugués gratuitas.
Gym: descuentos en las cuotas del gym o actividad física.
Aparcamiento: descuento en la cuota del aparcamiento del edificio.
Gafas: contribución en la factura de gafas graduadas o lentes de contacto..
Plan de retribución flexible







¡Únete a nuestro equipo!




REDARBOR una de las mejores empresas para trabajar en España según Great Place to Work.

Title: Ingeniero de software
Description:
CSIC's Artificial Intelligence Research Institute (IIIA) is looking for a SOFTWARE ENGINEER to join its Technological Development Unit as part of the smartNorms project funded by AGAUR (the Agency for Management of University and Research Grants of the Generalitat de Catalunya).




The smartNorms project seeks to innovate, through ICT, in the automated compliance checking with respect to standards and codes in the Architecture, Engineering and Construction (AEC) sector, in order to make a qualitative leap in the interoperability capacity between the different agents involved, and thus significantly improve project management in this industrial sector. For this reason, an experimental prototype of a tool will be developed that demonstrates computational support for the verification task, combining modeling and information management techniques with knowledge-based artificial intelligence techniques. A small advance in the automation of the process can mean a significant reduction in time, cost and risk of error, in addition to orienting the adoption of those ICT technologies that will lead to a quality and efficient electronic administration in its rule verification task.




The contract will be complemented with an entrepreneurship training plan by AGAUR, whose purpose is the generation of new business models for the valorization and transfer of research results, and will count with the supervision of a Industrial Mentor from the SME Enginyeria i Project Management.




Requirements:

Bachelor Degree in Computer Science (Grado en Ingeniería Informática)
Excellent programming skills, particularly in Python and Java
Knowledge of semantic technologies (RDF, SPARQL, OWL, ...)




In addition, the following skills will be assessed:

Knowledge in computational logic and formal verification
Experience in the AEC (Architecture, Engineering and Construction) sector and in BIM (Building Information Modeling) processes
Good communication and teamwork skills
Good knowledge of English




Salary: 36.463,15 € per year (before tax)
Duration: 15 months
Workday: 40 hours per week
Workplace: IIIA-CSIC, Campus UAB, Bellaterra (Cerdanyola del Vallès)
Start date: 15 April 2023, or as soon as possible
Closing date: 15/APR/2023




Candidates should send their CV in pdf format by email, with the subject "smartNorms job offer" to Dr. Marco Schorlemmer (marco@iiia.csic.es).




For more information, please contact Dr. Marco Schorlemmer (marco@iiia.csic.es)

Title: LGV Software Programmer
Description:
E80 Group is specialized in the development of automated and integrated intralogistics solutions for manufacturers of consumer goods operating in the beverage, food, tissue and other sectors. Thanks to innovative technologies and a thorough understanding of the customers' logistic processes, the company anticipated the concept of Industry 4.0: the Smart Factory, sustainable, interconnected and safe.

The main systems produced by E80 Group include palletizing robots, a wide range of laser guided vehicles, high speed robotic stretch wrappers, pallet control systems, robotic labelers, layer picking and repacking solutions, and automated high-density warehouses. The entire logistics flow is centrally managed by the SM.I.LE80 software platform (Smart Integrated Logistics), the "orchestra conductor" that ensures the efficient integration of the systems, guaranteeing the optimal management of all operations, from the entry of raw materials to storage right through to shipping.

To date, E80 Group has built around 350 integrated factories in different parts of the world, installing more than 2,500 robotic systems, more than 6,500 laser-guided automatic vehicles and, from 2016, 40 high-density automatic warehouses.

E80 Group has always been close to its customers, its people and to the local communities in which the company operates. For this reason, the Group relies on five values that lead E80 people towards success: innovate, dare, solve, value, connect.

Position:

The LGV Software Programmer works in the LGV Software department which in the E80 Group is the reference point for Sales, Project Management, Site Management and Hardware Engineering for all types of projects with LGVs because he/she is responsible for developing the LGV software, implementing, testing and installing LGV machines produced by E80 on the customer's premises and keeping them efficient.

Responsibilities:

Configuring the software of hardware devices installed in the LGV vehicle and performing static operational testing
Performing dynamic safety and operational tests
Performing development, simulation and layout analysis of simple systems
Performing testing and troubleshooting for any issues affecting the LGVs during installation on the customer's premises
System optimization during installation on the customer's premises

Requirements:

Technical Diploma in Electronics
English, level B1
Ability to read and understand wiring diagrams
Working knowledge and use of basic Autocad software commands
Ability to read and understand programming languages (typically PLC, as per standard IEC 61131-11)
Familiarity with basic Wi-Fi network principles (understanding and configuration of access point/access client)
Willingness to undertake > 150 days of international travel
Flexibility and change management
Analysis and problem-solving skills
Collaboration and teamwork

Other information:

Full time Contract

Title: Python BP Automation Developer
Description:
This is a fantastic opportunity to join an exciting, fast-paced industry in a caring, nurturing, motivational and multicultural environment, that allows for true personal advancement and career progression.




We can offer you:




A value-based culture - all of our employees live by our shared core values which in turn brings everyone together in a collaborative culture with a real sense of community.
We can offer you access to an online learning portal assisting you in progressing and developing your skillset further.
Hybrid working
Benchmarked salary and progression paths.




Job Purpose:




Robots are taking over the world…and you will be behind the plot to create a robotic army that will serve TD SYNNEX Corporation to reach their ambitious goals.




You will mold and shape the direction of BPA initiatives, leverage development tools to replace redundant business processes, analyze the performance of RPA architecture, and refactor for scalability and performance.




Through all this process, you also will have to work with various business stakeholders, analysts and IT teams to develop sustainable solutions.




Responsibilities:




Develop, deploy and maintain Robotics Process Automation (RPA) solutions using different tools
Problem-solve issues that arise in day-to-day running of automation processes and provide timely responses and solutions as required
Support business teams in testing activities: internal testing, end-to-end business process testing and UAT
Create and maintain solution documentation
Monitor and report on the status of automation efforts.
Advise on industry best practices in process efficiency and software solutions




Knowledge Skills and Experience:




Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience
Experience with Automation Anywhere, Kryon, BluePrism, WorkFusion, Contextor, UiPath, or related robotic process automation software is valuable
Any scripting knowledge or experience (Python, Perl, VB Script, Shell script, PowerShell, etc.)
Advanced Knowledge in Microsoft Office program (Excel)
SAP-knowledge (SAP R/3 and Business Warehouse) is a plus
Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills




And last… but surely not least:




You will work in an international environment for a fortune Top100 organization.
We are an organization wherein we take our values very seriously and wherein we pay sincere attention to ‘diversity and inclusion’.
An organization where humor and fun are very important. Work hard, play hard.
A very active staff association.
TD SYNNEX is a certified ‘Top Employer’ and proclaimed to be one of the most appealing employers in IT more than once.
Hybrid working (partially from home, partially from the office).
The best coffee. Pretty important.




If you are looking for an opportunity in an exciting fast paced industry with training and support to help you achieve career goals, continuous progression and the chance to grow your new career, apply today to find out more about TD SYNNEX and what we have to offer.




At TD SYNNEX, we embrace diversity and promote equal opportunities. As a Disability Confident employer, we are committed to providing everyone with the opportunity to demonstrate their skills, talent and abilities, by offering reasonable adjustments throughout the recruitment process and in the workplace where required.




We value the difference that you bring and offer a culture for you to thrive and succeed.




What’s In It For You?




Elective Benefits: Our programs are tailored to your country to best accommodate your lifestyle.
Grow Your Career: Accelerate your path to success (and keep up with the future) with formal programs on leadership and professional development, and many more on-demand courses.
Elevate Your Personal Well-Being: Boost your financial, physical, and mental well-being through seminars, events, and our global Life Empowerment Assistance Program.
Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: It’s not just a phrase to us; valuing every voice is how we succeed. Join us in celebrating our global diversity through inclusive education, meaningful peer-to-peer conversations, and equitable growth and development opportunities.
Make the Most of our Global Organization: Network with other new co-workers within your first 30 days through our onboarding program.
Connect with Your Community: Participate in internal, peer-led inclusive communities and activities, including business resource groups, local volunteering events, and more environmental and social initiatives.




Don’t meet every single requirement? Apply anyway.




At TD SYNNEX, we’re proud to be recognized as a great place to work and a leader in the promotion and practice of diversity, equity and inclusion. If you’re excited about working for our company and believe you’re a good fit for this role, we encourage you to apply. You may be exactly the person we’re looking for!




Show more Show less
HTML:
This is a fantastic opportunity to join an exciting, fast-paced industry in a caring, nurturing, motivational and multicultural environment, that allows for true personal advancement and career progression.


We can offer you:


  • A value-based culture - all of our employees live by our shared core values which in turn brings everyone together in a collaborative culture with a real sense of community.
  • We can offer you access to an online learning portal assisting you in progressing and developing your skillset further.
  • Hybrid working
  • Benchmarked salary and progression paths.


Job Purpose:


Robots are taking over the world…and you will be behind the plot to create a robotic army that will serve TD SYNNEX Corporation to reach their ambitious goals.


You will mold and shape the direction of BPA initiatives, leverage development tools to replace redundant business processes, analyze the performance of RPA architecture, and refactor for scalability and performance.


Through all this process, you also will have to work with various business stakeholders, analysts and IT teams to develop sustainable solutions.


Responsibilities:


  • Develop, deploy and maintain Robotics Process Automation (RPA) solutions using different tools
  • Problem-solve issues that arise in day-to-day running of automation processes and provide timely responses and solutions as required
  • Support business teams in testing activities: internal testing, end-to-end business process testing and UAT
  • Create and maintain solution documentation
  • Monitor and report on the status of automation efforts.
  • Advise on industry best practices in process efficiency and software solutions


Knowledge Skills and Experience:


  • Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience
  • Experience with Automation Anywhere, Kryon, BluePrism, WorkFusion, Contextor, UiPath, or related robotic process automation software is valuable
  • Any scripting knowledge or experience (Python, Perl, VB Script, Shell script, PowerShell, etc.)
  • Advanced Knowledge in Microsoft Office program (Excel)
  • SAP-knowledge (SAP R/3 and Business Warehouse) is a plus
  • Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills


And last… but surely not least:


  • You will work in an international environment for a fortune Top100 organization.
  • We are an organization wherein we take our values very seriously and wherein we pay sincere attention to ‘diversity and inclusion’.
  • An organization where humor and fun are very important. Work hard, play hard.
  • A very active staff association.
  • TD SYNNEX is a certified ‘Top Employer’ and proclaimed to be one of the most appealing employers in IT more than once.
  • Hybrid working (partially from home, partially from the office).
  • The best coffee. Pretty important.


If you are looking for an opportunity in an exciting fast paced industry with training and support to help you achieve career goals, continuous progression and the chance to grow your new career, apply today to find out more about TD SYNNEX and what we have to offer.


At TD SYNNEX, we embrace diversity and promote equal opportunities. As a Disability Confident employer, we are committed to providing everyone with the opportunity to demonstrate their skills, talent and abilities, by offering reasonable adjustments throughout the recruitment process and in the workplace where required.


We value the difference that you bring and offer a culture for you to thrive and succeed.


What’s In It For You?


  • Elective Benefits: Our programs are tailored to your country to best accommodate your lifestyle.
  • Grow Your Career: Accelerate your path to success (and keep up with the future) with formal programs on leadership and professional development, and many more on-demand courses.
  • Elevate Your Personal Well-Being: Boost your financial, physical, and mental well-being through seminars, events, and our global Life Empowerment Assistance Program.
  • Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: It’s not just a phrase to us; valuing every voice is how we succeed. Join us in celebrating our global diversity through inclusive education, meaningful peer-to-peer conversations, and equitable growth and development opportunities.
  • Make the Most of our Global Organization: Network with other new co-workers within your first 30 days through our onboarding program.
  • Connect with Your Community: Participate in internal, peer-led inclusive communities and activities, including business resource groups, local volunteering events, and more environmental and social initiatives.


Don’t meet every single requirement? Apply anyway.


At TD SYNNEX, we’re proud to be recognized as a great place to work and a leader in the promotion and practice of diversity, equity and inclusion. If you’re excited about working for our company and believe you’re a good fit for this role, we encourage you to apply. You may be exactly the person we’re looking for!

Title: Programador/a Full Stack
Description:
En Audax Renovables somos conscientes que el valor diferencial de una compañía, son las personas que la conforman. Por ello nuestro principal reto, se encuentra en impulsar el desarrollo y crecimiento de tu carrera profesional. Es por ello que precisamos incorporar un/a Programador/a Full Stack en nuestra oficina de Badalona (BARCELONA):




Requisitos

Estudios mínimos: CFGS

Experiencia mínima: 2 años

Residencia: Provincia de Barcelona o alrededores

Conocimientos avanzados en PHP, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, HTML5, CSS3 y SQL.




Funciones:

-Mantenimiento de la web e intranet corporativas

-Desarrollo de nuevas funcionalidades




Horario flexible de L-J 08:30/09:00 a 17:30/18:00 y viernes alternos de 08:00 a 14:00 horas. Meses de Julio y Agosto de 08:00 a 15:00 horas.

Dos días de teletrabajo a la semana




Salario Bruto Anual de 18.000 a 24.000€ según experiencia del candidato. Se realizará prueba de conocimientos.

Title: Big Data Engineer
Description:
💜 Are you a Big Data Engineer looking for a new challenge?




👀So.. keep reading it can be just what you're looking for!




✍️Responsibilities:




Accountable for driving and executing data pipeline for the ODL ecosystem.
Leads and coordinates data acquisition from both internal and external sources.
Ensures that non-functional/support aspects of data classification and Data Sharing agreements (DSAs) and sign-offs are fulfilled.
Closely collaborates with information architect and system leads of IT domains.
Assures guidelines and best practices for data and metadata acquisition are in place and followed.
Collaborates closely with internal and external partners.




👍Your profile:




Bachelor's or Master's in Information Technology or equivalent education with IT focus.
Proven practical experience in managing data ingestion projects in Hadoop environments using agile methodologies.
Experience with Spark, Python and analytic products.
Solid knowledge of data structures and experience with integration of data from multiple sources.
Experience working in an Agile Environment using Test Driven Developments (TDD) and Continuous Integration (CI).
Excellent spoken and written English.
Experience working in a virtual, international and multicultural environment.
Willingness and readiness to travel.




🚀What we can offer you:




You will join a highly motivated team, where everyone is developing themselves to higher levels of professionality.
Remote work.
Flexible working hours.
Competitive salary + flexible retribution + medical insurance.
Career path.
Continuous follow up and team buildings.
Tech communities where you can share your knowledge with your colleagues.
A lot of different internal trainings (tech and non-tech) & Meetups
Special training budget you can use for whatever you want to (certifications, books, events, etc)
Languages courses.




We’re very open to hearing your opinions and ideas about how we can do things better, so please, let us know 😊

📧 There’s much much more, so, if you want to hear it, just apply!




Meanwhile, you can check out our web:

www.inno-it.es

https://www.meetup.com/es-ES/Meetup-de-InnoIT-Consulting-en-Barcelona/?_locale=es-ES




We’re waiting for you 😊

Title: Mobile Software Engineer (Flutter) @ fast growing ed-tech leader (Remote)
Description:
We are currently staffing a permanent, fully remote Mobile Software Engineer role for one of the fastest-growing global ed-tech companies.




In this role, you will help to build a unique mobile learning experience. You should have approximately two years of flutter experience and 3-5 years of general software engineering experience in a high-growth software product company.




You can work remotely from any European country.




| ABOUT THE ROLE




In this role, you will participate in all phases of the development life-cycle to translate and build the designs and wireframes into high-quality, responsive UI code and ensure the continuous improvement of the user experience.




| WHAT YOU WILL GET




Join a startup culture with lots of freedom degree to shape a state-of-the-art mobile app in one of the fastest-growing global ed-tech companies.
Competitive Salary up to ~65k€ / year ( + can be negotiated in case of excellent fit)
Top-class personal development courses and budgets to help you extend your skills and become a superstar;)
Fully remote setup, unique quarterly team events & a strong focus on individual flexibility and well-being




| NEXT STEPS




If you are interested in this role, we will share additional information about the company and position to support your decision-making process and invite you to a first chat with the head of engineering.

Title: Python Developer Senior
Description:
¿Quiénes somos?




Somos ARATECH, Lifestyle Technology. Una empresa con más de 10 años de experiencia en IT y consultoría. El grupo de profesionales que trabaja en ARATECH tiene como misión ofrecer las mejores soluciones a nuestros clientes trabajando junto a ellos en su Transformación Digital para proveer del mejor asesoramiento estableciendo una colaboración estrecha.




¿Con quién trabajamos?




Actualmente estamos trabajando con una empresa que busca impulsar el desarrollo tecnológico en pequeños y medianos negocios en el sector retail. Su producto es un software de gestión para las marcas, fabricantes y tiendas, que tiene como objetivo simplificar y resolver todos las operaciones en una misma plataforma.




¿Cuáles serán tus funciones?




Diseñar e implementar nuevos casos de uso de la herramienta.
Diseñar y desarrollar mejoras en la aplicación web.
Hacer code review y validación de desarrollos del equipo técnico.
Resolver dudas de los desarrollos al equipo de QA.




Requisitos:




¿Qué ofrecemos?




Contratación por cliente final.
Salario competitivo.
Trabajo en modalidad Híbrida (2 en casa y 3 en oficina)
La oportunidad de crecer personal y profesionalmente junto a una empresa digital en el sector Retail Tech y de aprender de todo este proceso con un equipo joven y TOP.
Posibilidad de promocionarse dentro de la empresa a corto-medio plazo.
Flexibilidad horaria.
Ambiente joven y dinámico.
Snacks & Food: fruta fresca, bebidas, snacks, café.
Open library, Workshops, Katas Dojos.
Cursos de formación.
Actividades de teambuilding.




¿Qué buscamos?




Experiencia de al menos 4 años en el desarrollo backend con Python (Django).
Experiencia en API Rest.
Experiencia con bases de datos relacionales y no relacionales.
Conocimiento de TDD.




Es un extra:




Experiencia en Angular, CSS y HTML.
Experiencia con metodologías ágiles (SCRUM)
Experiencia con docker.

Title: Full Stack Developer
Description:
Full Stack Developer (FSD)




Full-time, 40 hours per week, based in Barcelona (Spain) with a hybrid workplace model




Job description




ELEM Biotech, headquartered by the port of Barcelona, Spain, develops supercomputer and cloud-based Virtual Humans to revolutionize the assessment and personalization of both drug and device-based therapies. Our customers are pharmaceutical companies, medical device manufacturers, CROs, regulatory bodies and healthcare professionals.




Our product is V.Heart, a cloud-deployed modeling tool, accessible through a frontend. V.Heart allows the user to assess a treatment’s security and efficacy performance on cohorts of Virtual Humans. The Virtual Humans are avatars which are created thanks to our mathematical models. The core modeling tool is a multi-physics software, Alya, born in the Barcelona Supercomputing Center, which models the cardiovascular and respiratory systems from cell to organ level. 




Leveraging the power of supercomputers, ELEM allows to test medical therapies considering different age groups, genders, and diseases, to assess risk and improve go-to-market for the medtech and pharmaceutical industries.




We are looking for an innovative and dedicated Full Stack Developer, with experience in Cloud-deployed applications, who can work on both the back-end and front-end of systems. This means that you should be able to develop fully fledged platforms (with databases, servers and clients) which don’t need other applications to function and you should be comfortable around both front-end and back-end coding languages, development frameworks and third-party libraries, in particular: Python and Vue. You approach software holistically since you cater to both user experience and functionality.




As a Full Stack Developer you are able to produce scalable software solutions. You’ll be part of a cross-functional team that’s responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment. You should also be a team player with a knack for visual design and utility. If you’re also experienced with Agile methodologies, we’d like to meet you.




You will:




Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions
Design and implement complex and scalable web applications
Optimize the user experience in close cooperation with design and conception colleagues
Improve and extend existing backend and frontend solutions
Create automated cloud deployment solutions, reusable packages and test
Code with design principles in mind.
Optimize the technical processes together with your colleagues from the different departments.
Design client-side and server-side architecture
Build the front-end of applications through appealing visual design
Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications
Write effective APIs
Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software
Create security and data protection settings
Build features and applications with a responsive design
Write technical documentation
Work with modeling engineers, data scientists and analysts to improve software




Requirements




3+ years of proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role
Knowledge of multiple frontend languages and libraries (e.g. Vue, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, D3.js, XML, jQuery)
Knowledge of multiple backend languages (e.g. Python), JavaScript frameworks (e.g. Node.js), and Python frameworks (e.g. FastAPI)
Experience with workflow automation (e,g. Webpack) and code versioning (Git)
Familiarity with databases (e.g. Postgresql), ORMs (e.g. SQLAlchemy) web servers (e.g. Uvicorn, Apache) and UI/UX design
Experience in coding with design principles: OOP, SOLID, DRY, and TDD
Experience with AWS (e.g. EC2, S3, RDS, ELB)




Good to have




Experience in DDD design principle
Experience with OCI
Experience in the healthcare sector is a plus




Here’s what you can expect from us:




Ambitious and passionate people building high-tech software products in a vibrant Barcelona startup company revolutionizing healthcare industry
An innovative agile working environment allowing for collaboration with really smart people and knowledge sharing in cross-functional teams
An innovative technical and scientific supercomputer-based expertise background
A growing organization with room for development
Flexible working hours and hybrid home / office policy




Education and soft skills needed




MS or BS Degree in Engineering, Statistics, Computer Science, or similar background
Punctual and flexible
Fluent english speaker and writer 
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
Showing ability to work in a fast paced and changing environment
Great attention to detail
Organizational skills
An analytical mind




Computer Modelling and Simulation Technology in Cardiology




Computational models have an important and growing role in enabling patients to be diagnosed and treated on the basis of their specific pathophysiology, as simulations provide the link between the effects of cellular and tissue function or phenotypes.




Patient Models or specific pathologies are useful to comprehend and identify the mechanisms underpinning how an individual’s heart differs from another. Predictive modeling also contributes to the development of new diagnostics and devices, and to the tailoring of therapies for individual patients.







Find out more at elem.bio or our LinkedIn! Applicants should send their CV and motivation letter to: contact@elem.bio with the subject “FSD Job Reference”.

Title: Software Engineer
Place: Sant Cugat del Vallès, Catalonia, Spain
Description:
Ferchau, a company with national presence and specialized in providing solutions for the IT & Engineering sector, is looking for you! 📢📢📢




From the Recruitment division we are looking to incorporate a C++ Software Developer for the most important American multinational printer company. 👨‍💻




Objectives:

- Design code running on multiple platforms.

- Create test plans.

- Documentation of analysis of existing software applications




Services Development Support

To provide Services FW/SW Developer support, and the principal functions are:

- In embedded and host software development.

- Concurrent programming.

- Multithreaded and/or multi-process systems, understanding usage of synchronization primitives, different communication paradigms, mutual exclusion, producer-consumer schemes, memory sharing, data communication and priority assignment.

- Designing and integrating software systems running on multiple platform types into overall architecture.

- Evaluating forms and processes for software systems testing and methodology, including writing and execution of test plans, debugging, and testing scripts and tools, especially gtest/gmock.

- Code debugging: usage of debuggers and (desirable) tracing tools, memory corruptions and leakage detection and correction, stack analysis.

- Experience with testing suites, especially GTest/GMock (Google Test)

- Knowledge with:




Operating systems: Linux is a must, Windows optional
Programming by Components paradigm (Design Patterns)
Languages: Modern C++ (at least C++14), STL.
Tools: Git, Docker, GitHub, Visual Studio Code.
Project management: Scrum/Agile - Jira, Confluence, Sharepoint.
Nice to have: Python 🐍 (system tests), SQL (sqlite3), Qt (user interface), JSON, Flatbuffers/Easybuffers




Academic background:




Studies in Software or Electronic engineering (not exclusive).
English: B2 (must)




Benefits:




Hybrid 🌍
Permanent contract.
23 vacation days.
Career plan.

- Evaluating forms and processes for software systems testing and methodology, including writing and execution of test plans, debugging, and testing scripts and tools, especially gtest/gmock.

- Code debugging: usage of debuggers and (desirable) tracing tools, memory corruptions and leakage detection and correction, stack analysis.

- Experience with testing suites, especially GTest/GMock (Google Test)

- Knowledge with:


  • Operating systems: Linux is a must, Windows optional
  • Programming by Components paradigm (Design Patterns)
  • Languages: Modern C++ (at least C++14), STL.
  • Tools: Git, Docker, GitHub, Visual Studio Code.
  • Project management: Scrum/Agile - Jira, Confluence, Sharepoint.
  • Nice to have: Python 🐍 (system tests), SQL (sqlite3), Qt (user interface), JSON, Flatbuffers/Easybuffers


Academic background:


  • Studies in Software or Electronic engineering (not exclusive).
  • English: B2 (must)


Benefits:


  • Hybrid 🌍
  • Permanent contract.
  • 23 vacation days.
  • Career plan.

Title: Software Developer / Backend / Full Stack
Description:
⚠️ We will only consider profiles that complete this form

Complete this form: https://tally.so/r/waLWE3




Hi 👋!

We are a tech startup that is implementing a circular economy to eliminate single-use plastic in the takeaway and delivery industry through innovative returnable and reusable packaging concepts.




As of March 22, 2023 , Bumerang has prevented +200.000 residues, the equivalent of 6.500kg of single-use packaging




About the role:

We are looking for an experienced software engineer to join the product team to scale our technology implementing a strong engineering and product culture.

You will be a key member of our product team and work closely with their members to deliver the best experience to our customers and clients. Together with our CEO, COO, PM, and other stakeholders, you will contribute to the mid and long-term strategies and priorities in tech and product areas.




What we expect from you:
You feel comfortable going hands-on with code as an individual contributor but also in managing areas.
You have been part of a senior technology leadership team, and a significant driver of the prioritization, strategy, culture, and outcomes that the team delivered.
You worked closely with your teammates and stakeholders to identify, design, build, test, and launch new product features and enhancements.
You’ve been through the early phase of a successful B2C product. You stayed for the scaling phase as well and can speak to the lessons you learned.
You know how to balance the pace of delivery and learning with quality and readiness to scale, and can coach this in others.
You defined and implemented a technology roadmap - with clarity on feasibility, time, cost, and impact - in line with the company's business/product goals




Tech & infra stack:
Node JS (nestjs)
PostgreSQL
React Native
React + Redux
GCP & AWS




What we offer:
Between 42-58k€ gross annual salary (according to the candidate's experience)
Up to 2% phantom plan with a vesting period
Full-time contract with flexible working hours
Tooling, learning and conference budget
Home office or office work, depending on the candidate's preference
Offices located in Barcelona city center, perfectly connected. Check them out
Good working environment, future professional projection




⚠️ IMPORTANT

We need someone with great entrepreneurial skills, someone who is willing to make decisions and take risks, to defy her/his bosses, and to grow both technically and personally in their role.




How to apply1. Apply and answer these questions

Complete this form: https://tally.so/r/waLWE3

⚠️ We will only consider profiles that complete this form




2. First contact
If your profile fits our search, we will have a first interview to learn more about who you are, your values, your work process, and your personal and professional aspirations.
After this first contact, if we continue with your candidacy, we will send you an email with the details for a test.
If you do not fit the profile we are looking for, we will send you an email notifying you (it may take a little time)




3. Test
We will send you a test to perform at home
We will have a meeting to review the code and learn on how you actually move through the code maze.




4. Culture Fit interview
The last step is an interview with the founders (Luis and Oriol) to ensure that you not only have the perfect skills for the job, but also that you are the perfect fit for the team and the company culture.




5. Offer + Onboarding
After all checks are completed, all that remains is to sign the contract and have the onboarding process.

Title: Programador/a full stack
Description:
Abast, compañía con más de 35 años implantando soluciones tecnológicas completas, innovadoras y estratégicas para nuestros clientes dando respuesta a las necesidades de nuestros clientes desde diferentes áreas de especialización mediante la consultoría y la integración de soluciones Cloud Computing, Servicios Gestionados, Gestión y Seguridad TI, Business Analytics y Big Data, Aplicaciones de Negocio, Infraestructura y Datacenter.




Actualmente estamos buscando un/a programador/a full stack para formar parte de importante cliente del sector farmacéutico.







¿Qué habilidades son necesarias para el puesto?




Tecnologías: Java, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, JQuery
Desarrollo de servicios web con JAVA (servicios SOAP o REST)
Tecnologías deseables: Ionic, ReactNative







¿Qué te ofrecemos?




·Posición estable con revisiones salariales periódicas junto a tu evolución profesional.

· Trabajo en Remoto (2 casa / 3 oficina)

·Ubicación: Barcelona centro (zona eixample)

· Horario: L-J (09:00-14:00 15:00-18:30) V (09:00-14:30)

·Ventajas sociales como Plan de Retribución Flexible (tarjeta restaurante, tarjeta transporte, cheques guardería).

·Descuento seguro médico.







En ABAST seguimos creciendo, ¿te gusta el dinamismo y los retos? Podrás crecer y desarrollarte profesionalmente dentro de un equipo multidisciplinar y comprometido con los valores corporativos de ABAST.




Si quieres conocernos un poco más, puedes en:

http://www.abast.es/

https://www.youtube.com/user/AbastGrup

Title: Back-end Developer / Programmer for our SRI department
Description:
Descripción




The Barcelona Institute for Global Health (ISGlobal) is a cutting-edge institute addressing global public health challenges through research, translation into policy and education. ISGlobal has a broad portfolio in communicable and non-communicable diseases including environmental and climate determinants, and applies a multidisciplinary scientific approach ranging from the molecular to the population level. Research is organized in three main areas, Malaria and other Infectious Diseases, Child and Maternal Health, and Urban Health, Climate & Non-Communicable Diseases. ISGlobal is accredited with the Severo Ochoa distinction, a seal of excellence of the Spanish Science Ministry.




Lugar




Barcelona




What we are looking for




ISGlobal is seeking a Back-end developer to provide support and maintenance of internal web applications development, mainly the institutional intranet and corporative website, and also provide technical support and maintenance to different websites, and other related tasks, like technical support for reported web application incidents, documentation of tools and services provided.




Additionally, this IT position will participate in development of an intranet-based project, with the overall goal of developing a fully functional KPI (indicators) system, as well as increasing the management and visibility of internal data of all the institute’s areas, placing this information in an accessible format in the institute’s intranet. This will be done in coordination with all the institute’s areas, gathering their data inputs, and improving and creating when needed the required modules, data connections and systems to make it possible.




Requirements




Experience with Development platforms: Ruby on Rails, Javascript (JQuery), HTML, CSS, SASS.
Experience with GIT Version Control System
Experience with other programming languages: PHP, Python
Experience with Relational DataBases Management (MySQL, MariaDB, SQLServer, PostgreSQL, others,)
Experience with management of Linux OS (CentOS, Ubuntu, RedHat..)
Intermediate level of English (written and spoken)




It will be valued




Knowledge with CMS Wordpress, Drupal, Joomla, LifeRay management
Knowledge of REST (JSON) and SOAP protocols
Knowledge of docker container and images management
Knowledge of other frameworks: nodejs, react, django, etc
Knowledge of NoSQL Databases (MongoDB, etc)
Knowledge of computer networks
Knowledge of NGinx with Unicorn webserver
Knowledge of Google Apps (administrator profile)
Knowledge and experience of technical support with SAP-BO (customer incidents, Add-Ons updates, etc.)
Experience or Knowledge with Business Intelligence tools (ETL tools and Data Analytics)




Skills




Good treatment and relationship with people, professional communicative, self-taught and willing to work as a team.
Empathic with the ability to work with professionals from very different cultures, mindsets and ways of working.
Ability to: Recognize and resolve system-related problems; communicate technical and complex information both in oral and written form; effectively plan, organize and prioritize work assignments; coordinate multiple projects concurrently and work with minimum guidance and direction.
Proven expertise in providing assistance (technical or otherwise)




Key responsibilities




Create and optimize a secure website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS practices
Provide ongoing technical support for one or more websites.
Maintain communication with team members and supervisors regarding website state
Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices
Perform routine site audits as well as ongoing maintenance as needed
Integrate data from various back-end services and databases
Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs
Create and maintain software documentation
Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling our site
Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and activities




Conditions




Full time postion
Permanent contract
Salary Scales: 25k - 28k.




How to apply




Applicants must fill in the request form and include the following code reference position: BackDeveloper_Programmer_Mar23, attach the CV and a Cover Letter. Each attached document must be named with the candidate's name and surname.




The receipt of applications will be open until the position is filled.




Only the applications submitted through the request form will be considered.




Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.




The interviews could be placed during the reception candidatures period.




In ISGlobal we are committed to maintaining and developing a work environment in which the values and principles of our organization are respected and equal opportunities between women and men be promoted in each of the areas in which we operate, not tolerating discrimination based on criteria such as age, gender, marital status, race, ethnicity, functional diversity, political leanings, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or gender expression.




ISGlobal supports the initiative # ScienceforUkraine . Therefore, to sustain Ukraine’s presence in the European Research Area and international scholarly community, candidates from Ukraine on all levels of scholarly career are welcome: students, PhD candidates, early career researchers and senior scholars.




We confirm our commitment towards the value of the diversity of our staff and student population and seek to promote peace, equity, diversity and inclusion as essential elements in contributing to improving health worldwide.

In ISGlobal we are committed to maintaining and developing a work environment in which the values and principles of our organization are respected and equal opportunities between women and men be promoted in each of the areas in which we operate, not tolerating discrimination based on criteria such as age, gender, marital status, race, ethnicity, functional diversity, political leanings, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or gender expression.


ISGlobal supports the initiative # ScienceforUkraine . Therefore, to sustain Ukraine’s presence in the European Research Area and international scholarly community, candidates from Ukraine on all levels of scholarly career are welcome: students, PhD candidates, early career researchers and senior scholars.

Title: Software Engineer
Place: Sant Cugat del Vallès, Catalonia, Spain
Description:
Ferchau, empresa con presencia nacional y especializada en aportar soluciones para el sector IT & Engineering, ¡te está buscando! 📢📢📢




Nuestro cliente, empresa Americana lider en soluciones de impresión 2D y 3D, quiere sumar a su equipo un Ingeniero de Software altamente calificado y apasionado por el desarrollo de sistemas embebidos basados en Yocto Linux. Buscamos a alguien que comparta nuestra pasión por la innovación y la excelencia en la ingeniería. Si tienes experiencia en Linux, Yocto, shell script y C++, ¡nos encantaría que te unas a nuestro equipo!




Responsabilidades:




Diseñar, desarrollar e implementar soluciones de software para sistemas embebidos basados en Yocto Linux.
Colaborar con otros equipos de ingeniería para integrar soluciones de software en dispositivos de impresión Ferchau.
Escribir y mantener shell scripts y código en C++ para optimizar el rendimiento y la funcionalidad de nuestros productos.
Participar en la investigación y el desarrollo de nuevas tecnologías y enfoques para mejorar la eficiencia y calidad de nuestros productos.
Contribuir a la documentación técnica y al soporte para equipos internos y externos.
Identificar y solucionar problemas en el proceso de desarrollo y en el producto final.




Requisitos:




Licenciatura en Ingeniería de Software, Ingeniería Informática, Ciencias de la Computación o campo relacionado.
Experiencia mínima de 3 años trabajando con sistemas embebidos y Yocto Linux (requisito indispensable).
Dominio de shell scripting y lenguaje de programación C++.
Conocimientos avanzados en Linux, incluyendo el desarrollo y configuración de kernels y controladores.
Uso avanzado de Git y Jira, test unitarios.
Experiencia en la integración y el uso de herramientas de desarrollo open source.
Excelentes habilidades de comunicación y trabajo en equipo.
Capacidad para trabajar de manera independiente y autónoma, así como en un entorno de equipo multidisciplinario.
Inglés B2.




Se valorará:




Experiencia previa en el desarrollo de software para dispositivos de impresión o sistemas embebidos similares.
Conocimientos en otros lenguajes de programación y herramientas de desarrollo.
Certificaciones o cursos relacionados con Linux, Yocto y/o desarrollo de sistemas embebidos.




Ofrecemos:




Contratación indefinida
Oportunidades de crecimiento y desarrollo profesional.
Ambiente de trabajo dinámico e innovador.
Participación en proyectos internacionales y de vanguardia.




Te estamos esperando!

Title: Associate Software Engineer
Description:
ADP is looking for the next generation of technologists to join our Global Product and Technology (GPT) Development Program.

What's our secret to success? Well, that's easy. People like you. We're looking for enthusiastic new graduates to help us build the next generation of ADP technologies. As part of the GPT Development Program, your goal is simple: learn as much as possible in six weeks. We'll get you started with the tools, technology, and technical knowledge you need to succeed. Then, you'll be placed amongst our brightest associates as an Associate Application Developer, joining our group of passionate technologists who make it all possible by innovating creative solutions to new challenges.

A little about ADP: We are a global leader in HR technology, offering the latest AI and machine learning-enhanced payroll, tax, HR, benefits, and much more. We believe our people make all the difference in cultivating an inclusive, down-to-earth culture that welcomes ideas, encourages innovation, and values belonging. We've received recognition as a global Best Places to Work and recipient of many prestigious awards for diversity, equity, and inclusion, including a DiversityInc® Top 50 Company, Best CEO and company for women, LGBTQ+, and more. Learn more on our YouTube channel: http://adp.careers/DEI_Videos

Responsibilities

THINGS YOU'LL DO:

Work with our world-class computer scientists and engineers to build the next generation of ADP's innovative products
Network with professionals who will guide and support you as you enhance your skills and gain experience
Gain real-world experience with today's leading technologies in programming, scripting, designing, or web development


Required Qualifications

EXPERIENCE YOU'll NEED:

Graduate or maximum of two years of professional experience
Completing a bachelor's or graduate degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent area of study
Knowledge in programming and scripting languages such as Java, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Python
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Critical thinking and an analytical mindset
Be passionate about "next-generation" technologies


Preferred Qualifications

BONUS POINTS FOR THESE:

Familiarity with Spring Boot, React, Node.js, and Angular
Understanding of server, database, and storage technologies
Knowledge of Linux and/or Windows-based operating systems
Good level of English

If you've made it down this far, we have to ask: What are you waiting for? Apply now!

Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Equal Employment Opportunity at ADP: ADP affirms inequality is detrimental to our associates, our clients, and the communities we serve. Our goal is to impact lasting change through our actions. Together, we unite for equality and equity. ADP is committed to equal employment opportunities regardless of any protected characteristic, including race, color, genetic information, creed, national origin, religion, sex, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, lawful alien status, ancestry, age, marital status, or protected veteran status and will not discriminate against anyone on the basis of a disability. We support an inclusive workplace where associates excel based on personal merit, qualifications, experience, ability, and job performance.

Ethics at ADP: ADP has a long, proud history of conducting business with the highest ethical standards and full compliance with all applicable laws. We also expect our people to uphold our values with the highest level of integrity and behave in a manner that fosters an honest and respectful workplace. Click https://jobs.adp.com/life-at-adp/ to learn more about ADP's culture and our full set of values.

Explore our COVID-19 page https://tech.adp.com/covid19/ to understand how ADP is approaching safety, travel, the hiring interview process, and more.
